GSP31yuktdipu:37_0: sūtrapramāṇāvayavāḥ / teṣām upapattiḥ sūtrapramāṇāvayavopapattiḥ / upapattiḥ sambhava

GSP31yuktdipu:56: avayavānabhidhānamupadeśāt / na hi tathā pratyakṣādīni pramāṇānyupadiṣṭāni tathā avayavā upadiṣṭāḥ / tasmādavayavopapattirityetadasat /
GSP31yuktdipu:57_0: bhāṣyakāraprāmāṇyādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam / yadyapi sūtrakāreṇāvayavopadeśo na kṛtastathāpi
GSP31yuktdipu:57_1: bhāṣyakārāḥ kecideṣāṃ saṃgrahaṃ cakruḥ / te ca naḥ pramāṇam / tasmādyukatamavayavopapattiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:58: utsūtratvāt / nahyutsūtraṃ vyācakṣāṇā bhāṣyakārāḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavanti / tathā caitadutsūtritamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:60_0: na / liṅgāt / naitadyuktamanupadeśānna santi jijñāsādayaḥ / kintarhyanupadiṣṭamapyeṣāmastitvaṃ

GSP31yuktdipu:64: dṛṣṭāntaṃ dyotayati / kṣīrasya yathā tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānastyetyupasaṃharati (ISk 57)

GSP31yuktdipu:68: satāmanupadeśe prayojanavacanam / evaṃ cenmanyase- santi jijñāsādayo 'vayavāḥ,

GSP31yuktdipu:71: pramāṇāntarbhāvāt / pramāṇeṣvantarbhāva eṣāmityayamupadiṣṭo heturasmābhiḥ / anumānāṅgaṃ hi jijñāsādayaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:73: tantrāntarokteḥ / tantrāntareṣu hi vindhyavāsiprabhṛtirācāryairupadiṣṭāḥ / pramāṇaṃ ca naste ācāryā ityataścānupadeśo jijñāsādīnāmiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:76_0: pratyakṣādīnyapi ca tantrāntareṣūpadiśyante / śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣam / sambandhādekasmāccheṣasiddhiranumānam /

GSP31yuktdipu:83_0: takṣṇuhi caitra ityukte yāvadbhissādhanaviśeṣairvinā takṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate sarvāstāṃścaitra
GSP31yuktdipu:83_1: upādatte / tathā pratyakṣādiṣu pramāṇeṣūpadiṣṭeṣu yaireṣāmavinābhāvaḥ sarvāṇi tānyupādāsyāmahe / kiñcānyāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:85: anyatrāpyayamācāryaḥ pradhānāmevopadeśaṃ karoti / tadaṅgabhūtāstu tadupadeśādeva pratīyante / tadyathā,

GSP31yuktdipu:88_1: sādhyamāpnotīti kṛtvā pratipādakāḥ pratipādanakāle tantrāntaropadiṣṭānapi mūlaśakalādīnākṣepsyanti iti / kiñcānyat,

GSP31yuktdipu:93: tantrāntaropadiṣṭo 'pi karmayonīnām prāṇabhedādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇopadeśassaṃgṛhīto bhavatīti siddhaṃ tantrāntaropadeśādavayavānupadeśaḥ / tasmātsūktamevāvayavopapattiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:95_0: paṃcāśatpratyayāḥ / tatrāstitvamekatvaṃ paṃcabhirvītaiḥ siddham / arthavattvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:95_2: puruṣabahutvam / puruṣasya darśanārtha iti saṃyogaḥ / prāpte śarīrabhede iti viyogaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:95_3: samyagjñānādhigamāditi śeṣavṛttiḥ / tasmācca viparyāsāditi puruṣasyākartṛtvamityete daśa cūlikārthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:98: iti pañcāśatpratyayāḥ / saiṣā ṣaṣṭiḥ padārthānām / tadupapattiranyūnatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:99_0: saṃśayanirṇayoktiḥ / saṃśayaśca nirṇayaśca tau saṃśayanirṇayau tayoruktissaṃśayanirṇayoktiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:99_1: sāmānyābhidhānaṃ saṃśayaḥ / tadyathā mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ cetyukte (ISk 8)
GSP31yuktdipu:100: saṃśayo bhavati kena dharmeṇa kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ kena vā sarūpamiti / viśeṣābhidhānaṃ nirṇayaḥ / sa ca dvividhaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:101: śabdato 'rthataśca / śabdastāvat yathā hetumadādibhiḥ kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpam,
GSP31yuktdipu:102: traiguṇyādibhiḥ prakṛtisarūpamiti / arthatastat yathā tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:104: / kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmāt śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca (ISk 38)
GSP31yuktdipu:106: uddeśanirdeśam / uddeśaśca nirdeśaśca uddeśanirdeśam / sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣayaikavadbhavati iti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ / saṅkṣepavacanamuddeśaḥ / tadyathā,
GSP31yuktdipu:108: / vistaravacanaṃ nirdeśaḥ / tadyathā, pañca viparyayabhedā bhavanti (ISk 47)

GSP31yuktdipu:114: gajakarṇo 'śvakarṇa iti / prayatnato bhagavataḥ paramarṣerārṣeṇa jñānena sarvatattvānāṃ svarūpamupalabhya saṃjñāṃ vidadhato nāsti svarūpanibandhanaḥ śabdaḥ / tadyathā,

GSP31yuktdipu:128_1: śeṣabhūtaṃ syāt / taiścāpyavirodhastatra tatreti vakṣyāmaḥ / pūrvatantraśeṣabhāvāditi cet,

GSP31yuktdipu:154: pratiṣedhāt / kartari yau tṛjakau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate / tasmāttasyāpaghātaka iti vaktavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:156: śāstre darśanāt / “tatprayojako hetuśca” iti śāstre dṛṣṭaḥ prayogaḥ / padakāraścāha- jātivācakatvāt / tathā kadācidguṇo guṇaviśeṣo bhavati,

GSP31yuktdipu:160: duḥkhaśabdāvacanamādāvamaṅgalārthatvāt / maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti,

GSP31yuktdipu:170_1: gośabdena karmāntarebhyo vicchidya svātmanyavasthāpyate / kriyā ca gośabdaśca sarvakartṛbhyo
GSP31yuktdipu:170_3: niyamyete / śuklaśabdo gośabdaśca gośabdaṃ sarvaguṇaviṣayamādheyāntarebhyo vyavacchedya

GSP31yuktdipu:176: evaṃ sati kuto 'yaṃ niścayapratilambho yadduḥkhaśabdo 'yamamaṅgalārtho yāvatā sandihyata eva ayaṃ kiṃ svārthapratipattyarthamupātto 'tha heyatvāyeti / vākyasya tu maṅgalārthatvam,
GSP31yuktdipu:177_1: dṛṣṭam / tadyathā vyādhyapagamaḥ syādalakṣmīrmā bhūditi / duḥkhaprahāṇārthaṃ cedaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:180: guṇaikatvāt / duḥkhaṃ raja iti pratipanno bhavān,

GSP31yuktdipu:187_0: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca / śārīraṃ tāvadvātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ vaiṣamyanimittam / tathā mānasaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:190: tasya nimittabhedāt tritvopacāra iti satyametat / yattūktaṃ nimittānantyena guṇānantyaprasaṅga iti tadayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:191_0: bhede 'pi sati varṇasaṃkhyāvaddvyavasthānopapatteḥ / tadyathā catvāro varṇā ityasyāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:191_1: saṃkhyāyāḥ sati paippalādādibhede teṣāṃ brāhmaṇatvādivyatirekābhāvānna saṃkhyāntarahetutvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:191_2: no khalvapi varṇāvyatirekādekatvaṃ bhavati / evaṃ trīṇi duḥkhānītyasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:192: nimittabhedād bhedopacāra iti bhavāneva pratipannaḥ / na copacāraḥ paramārtha ityalamasthāne yatnena /
GSP31yuktdipu:194_1: sarveṣāmabhighāto 'stīti sarveṣāṃ jijñāsāprasaṅgaḥ / atha mataṃ duḥkhābhighāte kasyacijjijñāsā
GSP31yuktdipu:194_3: duḥkhatrayābhighāto na cāsyātyantike hetau jijñāsā babhūva / tena kiṃ prāptam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:195: paścādasya yato babhūva tadvaktavyam / yathānyatra brahmaṇo 'bhyāsanimittādadharmakṣayāt pūrvadharmānugrahācca vividiṣā,
GSP31yuktdipu:196: tathānyeṣāṃ kuśalamūlābhyāsaparipākāt / na cāpadiṣṭamato laghūktametat / kiñcānyat,
GSP31yuktdipu:197_1: ekadeśaśca saṃsārasya duḥkhatrayam / tasmāt prayojanamapyayuktam / kiñca nimittāntarasadbhāvāddivyakāmadhyānasukhānapekṣasyāpi
GSP31yuktdipu:198: na kevalaṃ tāpodvignasyāpi / tasmānnimittamapyayuktam / kiñcānyat / ubhayathā cāsambhavāt / parikalpyamānā khalvapīyaṃ jijñāsā puruṣasya vā syādguṇānāṃ vā / kiṃcātaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:201: ācetanyāt / na hyacetanā ghaṭādayo hitāhitaprāptiparihāraṃ jijñāsamānā dṛśyate / na ca cetanā bhavatāṃ guṇāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:204: tattvāntarānupapatteḥ / na ca guṇapuruṣavyatiriktaṃ vastutastattvāntaramasti yasya jijñāsā parikalpyamānā parikalpyeta / tasmādanupapannā jijñāsā /
GSP31yuktdipu:207: abhighātatvenāpratipatteḥ / yadyapyaviśiṣṭo 'bhighātastathāpi sarve nainamabhighātatvena pratipadyante / tathāhi,
GSP31yuktdipu:208_1: viṣayeṣūdvegāpadveṣau / na ca viṣayaparityāgo bhavati / tasmānnāviśiṣṭo 'bhighātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:209: athāpi syādyeyamasati viśeṣe sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmāsurereva bhagavato duḥkhatrayābhighātabuddhirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:210: na punaranyeṣāmityatra nimittamabhidhānīyam / na hyantareṇa nimittamasau viśeṣo 'vasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti / etaccāyuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:211_0: praśnāsambandhāt / kuto jijñāsā bhavatītyevaṃ codakena pūrvamakāri praśnastasyāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:211_1: sākṣāt kāraṇamabhighātaḥ kāraṇāntarāṇāmanabhidhānādityasyaiva nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ / yattu
GSP31yuktdipu:211_2: khalvidānīṃ kāraṇakāraṇamapi pṛcchyate tadanavasthāprasaṅgabhayānnocyate / atha nirbandhaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:211_4: pratiṣidhyata iti tadeva kiṃ na gṛhyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:212: etena prākprasaṅgaḥ pratyuktaḥ / yattūktaṃ tadabhighāte cānirmokṣo 'kṛtsnatvādityetadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:215_0: ityetāvānasmākaṃ saṃsāraḥ / na tu tadvyatiriktāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātavaḥ kvacidapi
GSP31yuktdipu:215_1: siddhāḥ / caturdaśavidhe ca saṃsāre yā sukhamātrā sā duḥkhabhūyastvāttacchabdavācyā
GSP31yuktdipu:216: atra janmajarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:219_0: dṛśyate ca loke bhūyasā grahaṇam / tadyathāmravanamiti / tasmāt kṛtsnavikalpapratiṣedho
GSP31yuktdipu:220: uttaratra pratiṣedhāt / iṣṭamevaitatsaṅgṛhītam / tathā cottarasūtreṇa pratiṣetsyatyācāryaḥ “dṛṣṭavadānuśravikaḥ sa hyaviśuddhikṣayātiśayayuktaḥ” (ISk 2)

GSP31yuktdipu:395_0: prajayā kiṃ kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ nāyamātmā nāyaṃ loka iti te ha sma putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:395_1: lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ carantīti /” tasmādete tyāgasannyāsayorubhayorliṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:396_0: āha - yadyapyevaṃ śāstraṃ tathāpi samanuṣṭhāne vidhirasti / vihitaṃ cāvaśyaṃ kartavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:396_1: sannyāse tvarthavādamātramityanayorayaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tasmin sati samanuṣṭhānaṃ jyāyo na tyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:398_0: āha- vidhistadarthatvenāpūrvopadeśaḥ / yo hi vidhyarthena liṅā loṭā kṛtyairvāpūrvopadeśaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:398_1: kriyate sa vidhiḥ / yathā- agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ / vāyavyaṃ śvetamajamālabheta
GSP31yuktdipu:398_2: bhūtikāma iti / stutirarthavādaḥ / tasya tu vihitasya prarocanārthaṃ yā stutiḥ so
GSP31yuktdipu:398_3: 'rthavādaḥ / tadyathā- “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva tena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati,
GSP31yuktdipu:399: sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati” iti / evaṃvidhāṃ hi stutimupaśrutya phalārthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate / etasmin hitakāmaḥ pravartate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:401: ata eva sannyāsasiddhiḥ / evaṃ cenmanyase yamāmnāyaḥ śreyāṃsamarthaṃ manyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:402: taṃ prarocanāya stauti tathā sannyāsasiddhiḥ / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:403: stutatvāt / bahulārthināṃ sannyāsamāmnāyaḥ stauti / sa kasmānna prarocate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:404_0: itarathā hyānarthakyam / yadi khalvapyarthavādaḥ stuvannapi na prarocayet yaduktaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:404_1: prarocanārtho 'rthavāda iti tadbhavadbhirhāpitavyaṃ syāt / anarthako hyevaṃ satyarthavādo
GSP31yuktdipu:404_2: na prarocanārthaḥ / arthāntaravacanaṃ vā / yadi prarocanārthatvamasya neṣyate tena
GSP31yuktdipu:404_3: tarhyarthāntaraṃ vaktavyam / mā bhūdanarthakatvaṃ vedaikadeśasyeti / tasmānnānayā
GSP31yuktdipu:404_4: vibhīṣikayā vayaṃ śakyāḥ sanmārgādapanetum / kiṃcānyat / ubhayathā vikalpe 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:404_5: ihāyamāmnāyo vidheyatvena vā sannyāsaṃ stūyāt avidheyatvena vā / kiṃcātaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:407: stutāvasya prayojanaṃ kartavyam / yaddhi kartavyatayā neṣṭaṃ tadapuruṣabuddhipūrvakaḥ svatantraḥ puruṣaniśśreyasārthaṃ pravartamāna āmnāyaḥ kimiti prarocayeta ?
GSP31yuktdipu:408: tasmādetāmapi kalpanāṃ kṛtvā kṛśamevaitat / athavobhathā vikalpa ityasyāyamanyo 'rthaḥ / ihāyamāmnāyo bhūtārthena vā sannyāsaṃ prarocayet / abhūtārthena vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:410: tadyadi tāvadbhūtārthena prarocayati tathā satyamṛtatvaprāpakasya sannyāsasyāparigrahe viṣayārāgādanyo heturvaktavyaḥ / athābhūtārthena,
GSP31yuktdipu:412_0: na hyetadyuktaṃ yadaśreyasi mārge pramāṇabhūta āmnāyo mātṛmodakanyāyenehitārthinaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:412_1: prāṇinaḥ pratārayet / tasmādayuktametat / kiñcānyat anekāntāt / nacāyamekānto yadvihitameva
GSP31yuktdipu:412_2: kartavyam / tathā ca śābarāḥ paṭhanti grāmagamanaṃ bhavataḥ śobhanamityatrāntareṇa
GSP31yuktdipu:412_3: vidhiṃ stutireva devadattaṃ grāmagamanāya prarocayatīti / kiñcānyat,
GSP31yuktdipu:413_0: āśaṅkāprasaṅgāt / yadi khalvapi kiñcit satyaṃ kiñcidanṛtaṃ brūyādvedaḥ tathā sati
GSP31yuktdipu:413_1: pauruṣeyavākyavadvedavākye 'pi āśaṃkā prasajyeta / tathā ca sati yaduktameva prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:413_2: aniṣṭaṃ caitat / kiṃ ca vidhyanumānaṃ vā tat,
GSP31yuktdipu:415_0: ityatisṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā / tatra sannyāse 'rthavādamupalabhya vidhirapyastīti anumātavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:415_1: anupalambhādadoṣa iti cet syāccaivaṃ yadyasau vidhirupalabhyate / tasmādanupalambhādayaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:416_0: anekabhedatvāt / upalabdhau yatnaḥ kriyatām / anekabhedo hi prativedamāmnāyaḥ / tatra
GSP31yuktdipu:416_2: sannyāsānupapattiriti cet- athāpi syādyadi sannyāsamapyāmnāyo vidheyaṃ manyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:416_3: tena yathā gārhasthyasyetikartavyatāṃ bhāryodvahanādikāṃ mantravadupadiśati tathā
GSP31yuktdipu:416_4: sannyāsamapyupadiśet / na tūpadiṣṭavān / tasmānnāsti sannyāsa iti / etadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:417: abhāvāt / itikartavyatānāṃ hi sarvāsāmabhāvaḥ sannyāsaḥ / tatra kiṃ śāstramupadekṣyati ?
GSP31yuktdipu:418: yāvatī khalvitikartavyatā sannyāsāṅgaṃ tāmupadiśati śāstram / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:419_0: evaṃ hyāha- “tapaḥśraddhe ye hyupavasanti araṇye śāntā vidvāṃso bhaikṣacaryā carantaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:419_1: sūryadvāreṇa te virajasaḥ prayānti yatrāmṛtaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyayātmā /” tatra tapaḥśraddhe
GSP31yuktdipu:419_2: ye hyapavasantītyenaṃ śraddhayopetaṃ yamaniyamalakṣaṇaṃ dharmamāha / araṇya iti gṛhebhyo
GSP31yuktdipu:419_3: vinissṛtim / śāntā itīndriyāṇāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca viṣayābhilāṣādvinivartanam / vidvāṃsa
GSP31yuktdipu:419_4: iti pūrvarātrāpararātrādiṣu kāleṣvanirviṇṇasya yogino jñānābhyāsam / bhaikṣacaryāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:419_5: caranta iti śarīrasthitinimittaṃ parimitamabhyavahāraniyogam / uttarārdhena ca phalamācaṣṭe /
GSP31yuktdipu:419_7: smṛtayo bhavatāṃ pramāṇamiti pakṣaḥ / tatra yaduktamitikartavyatānupadeśānnāsti sannyāsa
GSP31yuktdipu:419_8: ityedayuktam / evaṃ ca nityāni karmāṇi / yattvanenaitaduktamānuśraviko heturanaikāntika
GSP31yuktdipu:419_9: iti satyametat / avaśyaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalamabhyupagantavyam / itarathā hi tannimittasya
GSP31yuktdipu:422: kṣayagrahaṇasāmarthyāt / yadi pūrvasūtroktamihānuvartate kṣayagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:423: atyantābhāvaparyāyo hi kṣaya iti kṛtvā / evaṃ siddho 'viśuddhiyogaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:425_1: yāni hi yajeraṅgāni paśupuroḍāśādīni tāni parimitāni / parimitānāṃ sādhanānāṃ tantvādīnāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:425_2: parimitaṃ kāryaṃ paṭādi dṛṣṭam / parimitaṃ kṣayadharmi dṛṣṭam / tadvadeva / kiñcānyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:425_4: saṃsāraḥ / yadi punaḥ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ karmākṣayaphalaṃ syāt sa punarāvṛttyabhāvāt prāṇināṃ nopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:427: yacchabda āha tadasmākaṃ pramāṇam /” sa cāsya hetoramṛtatvamāha “tarati mṛtyuṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:428: tarati pāpmānamityādi” / tasmādanicchatāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyam / anabhyupagame vā pratijñāhānirvedaḥ pramāṇamiti / etacca naivam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:429: śabdāntareṇa virodhāt / anityatvamasya hetoḥ śabdo 'numanyate / tasyaivaṃ sati virodhaḥ prāpnoti / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:430: evaṃ hyāha- “atha ye ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate,
GSP31yuktdipu:431_0: athaitamevādhvānaṃ punarnivartante / yathaitamākāśaṃ ākāśādvāyum / te dhūmamabhisambhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:431_1: dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavati / megho bhūtvā pravarṣati / ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilā
GSP31yuktdipu:431_2: māṣā iti jāyante / tato vai yo 'nnamati yo retaḥ siñcati sa bhūya eva bhavatīti /”
GSP31yuktdipu:432_0: ubhayathābhidhānācchāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam / tadeva śāstraṃ nityatvamāha
GSP31yuktdipu:432_2: sati śāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti / tacca naivam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:433: asambhave satyarthāntaraklṛpteḥ / yatra hi pramāṇabhūtā śrutirasambhavinamarthaṃ codayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:434_0: tatrārthāntaraṃ kalpayati / tadyathā- “sa ātmano vapāmudakhidat” “stenaṃ manaḥ” “anṛtavādino
GSP31yuktdipu:434_1: vāg” ityevamādiṣu / evamihāpi nāsti sambhavaḥ yadeko 'rtho nityaśca syādanityaśceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:434_3: cet syānmatam- yathaiva bhavatā nityānityayorekatrāsambhavānnityatvasya bhaktyā kalpanā
GSP31yuktdipu:434_4: kṛtā tathaivānityatvasyāpi kariṣyata iti / etaccāyuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:435: sarvapramāṇavirodhaprasaṅgāt / vināśe hi bhaktyā kalpyamāne sarvapramāṇavirodhaḥ prasajyeta / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:436_1: nityatvānupapatteḥ / śabdavirodhaḥ te dhūmamabhisambhavantīti vacanāt / na tu nityatve
GSP31yuktdipu:439: prakṛṣṭārthatayā / yathā khalvapyamṛtaṃ vā mṛtamatijīvo mā te hāsiṣurasavaḥ śarīramityabhidhīyate / na ca prāṇināmatyantāyāsavo jahati,
GSP31yuktdipu:440: kintarhi prakṛṣṭaṃ kālam / evamihāpyucyate tarati mṛtyumiti / nātyantāya mṛtyuṃ tarati,
GSP31yuktdipu:441: kintarhi prakṛṣṭaṃ kālam / upacaryate hi loke prakṛṣṭe nityaśabdaḥ / tadyathā nityaprahasito nityaprajalpita iti / evaṃ siddhaḥ kṣayayogaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:442: āha, atiśayayoga idānīmasya hetoḥ kathamanumātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:443_0: ucyate- atiśayayogaḥ kriyābhyāsāt / yatra hi kriyā sakṛt pravartate yatra cāsakṛdāvartate
GSP31yuktdipu:443_1: tatrātiśayo dṛṣṭaḥ / tadyathā kṛṣyādiṣu / yajñe ca dravyopādānaśaktyapekṣā / kvacit sakṛdeva pravṛttiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:444_0: kvacit punaḥpunarāvṛttiḥ / tasmādatiśayena bhavitavyam / kiṃ cānyat aṅgātiśayāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:444_1: ihāṅgānāmatiśayādaṅgino 'pi ghaṭāderatiśayo dṛṣṭaḥ / asti cāyaṃ pratiyajñamaṅgānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:446_0: devatāṅgabhāvagamanāt kṣayātiśayānupapattiriti cet- athāpi syāt yo hi yajñe dravyamātrasya
GSP31yuktdipu:446_1: sādhanabhāvamanumanyate taṃ prati kṣayātiśayadoṣāvaparihāryau syātām / vayantu dravyasamavāyinīṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:446_2: devatāṃ kratāvaṅgabhāvamupagacchantīṃ vidmaḥ / tasmādadoṣo 'yamiti / taccānupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:447_1: na cātmakriyāṅgatvamudāsīnatvāt iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ / tasmādayuktametat / upetya vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:448: tena tarhi yadvā tadvā vedoktaṃ karma kṛtvā śakyo 'vāptumarthaḥ / kiṃ prāṇivināśahetubhiḥ kratubhiḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:450_0: na hi kiṃcitkarma vidyate yatra śarīrasyāṅgabhāvo na syāt / sarvadevatāmayaṃ ca śarīraṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:450_1: yasmādāha tasmādvai vidvānpuruṣamidaṃ brahmeti manyate / sarvā hyasmin devatāḥ śarīre
GSP31yuktdipu:450_3: evamayaṃ hetustridoṣaḥ / tena yaḥ phalaviśeṣo 'bhinirvartyate so 'pi tathājātīyaka
GSP31yuktdipu:452: yadi nāyaṃ śreyāniti kṛtvāsya jijñāsornātra samādhiḥ tena tarhi yaḥ śreyān phalaviśeṣaḥ sa upadeṣṭavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:455_1: tasmādviparītaḥ śuddho 'kṣayo niratiśaya ityarthaḥ / ko 'sāvityucyate mokṣaḥ śreyān /
GSP31yuktdipu:460_0: saṃyogābhāvāt / duḥkhaṃ ca pradhānam / tathā ca tantrāntareṣvapyuktam- duḥkhahetuḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:460_1: kāryakaraṇaśaktiriti / tena yadā puruṣasya saṃyogastadāviśuddhitvamasya / svaśaktiviśeṣayogātteṣu
GSP31yuktdipu:460_2: teṣu jātyantaraparivarteṣu dharmādinimittasāmarthyādāyāsamanubhavati / yadā tu pradhānasaṃyogo
GSP31yuktdipu:460_3: vinivartate tadā nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpyabhāva iti kṛtvā na punardvandvānyanubhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:461: āha, kimarthaḥ punarayaṃ pradhānasya puruṣeṇa saha saṃyogaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:468_0: vyaktaṃ cāvyaktaṃ ca jñaśca vyaktāvyaktajñāḥ / teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:468_1: tasmāt / bahuṣvaniyamādalpāco 'pi jñaśabdasya na pūrvanipātaḥ / athavā jñānasya sādhakatamaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:468_2: vyaktam / tatpūrvakatvādavyaktasamadhigamasyetyabhihitam / yadvā vyaktaṃ ca avyaktaṃ ca te vyaktāvyakte,
GSP31yuktdipu:472: tatra rūpapravṛttiphalalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktam / rūpaṃ punaḥ mahānahaṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni / sāmānyataḥ pravṛttirdvividhā / hitakāmaprayojanā ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:473_0: ahitapratiṣedhaprayojanā ca / viśeṣataḥ paṃca karmayonayo vṛttyādyāḥ prāṇādyāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:473_1: pañca vāyavaḥ / phalaṃ dvividham / dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ ca / tatra dṛṣṭaṃ siddhituṣṭyaśaktiviparyayalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:473_2: adṛṣṭaṃ brahmādau stambaparyante saṃsāre śarīrapratilambha ityetad vyaktam / eṣāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:474: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ bhedamabhedaṃ ca vijñāya saṃyoganivṛttiṃ labhate / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:475_1: saṃyogaḥ tasmādasya pratidvandvibhūtena jñānena viyogahetunā bhavitavyam / ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:476: tamaḥprakāśavat / yathā tamasā tirohitāni dravyāṇi ghaṭādīni nopalabhyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:477: tatpratidvandvibhūtena tu pradīpena prakaśitānāmeṣāmupalabdhirbhavati / tadvadihāpi draṣṭavyamiti siddhaṃ jñānānmokṣaḥ / uktaṃ ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:480: kiṃ cānyat / āmnāyābhihitatvāt / āmnāyanibandhano hyayamartho jñānānmokṣa iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:482: evaṃ hyāha- “satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā /“
GSP31yuktdipu:484: ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān na bibheti kutaścana //“
GSP31yuktdipu:485_0: “tameva viditvāmṛtatvameti nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate /” tathā brāhmaṇe 'pyuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:487: jñānavācino 'mṛtatvanimittābhyupagamānmahata āmnāyāntarasyānarthakyam / yadi jñānavācina āmnāyakhaṇḍakādamṛtatvamavāpyata ityetadabhyupagamyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:488: tena kriyāvācino mahata āmnāyāntarasyānarthakyaṃ prāptam / kiṃ kāraṇam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:489: na hyanāyāseneṣṭāvāptau satyām āyāsabhūyiṣṭhe karmaṇi pravartamānaḥ kṛtī bhavatīti / āha ca -
GSP31yuktdipu:490: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31yuktdipu:495: samuccaye tūbhayārthavattvam / jñānakarmaṇostu samuccaye 'bhyupagamyamāne dvayorapyāmnāyārthavattā siddhā bhavati / vidvān yajeta vidvān yājayediti vacanāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:496: tathā sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kratāvadhikāraḥ aśrotriyaṣaṇḍhaśūdravarjamitinyāyāt / tasmājjñānakarmaṇoḥ samuccayādiṣṭaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:498: pūrvadoṣāparihārāt / yadi niyamato viduṣaiva karmāṇi kartavyānītyabhyupagamyate tena yaḥ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃsārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:499_0: tasyāparihāraḥ / kiṃ ca śāstrahāneśca / yaśca śāstramiṣṭāpūrte samupāsyate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavantīti
GSP31yuktdipu:499_1: tadetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ hīyate / kiṃ cānyat- bhinnaphalatvāt / ihābhinnaphalāni dravyāṇi
GSP31yuktdipu:499_2: samuccīyante / tadyathā bhujyaṅgāni sūpādīni / abhinnaṃ teṣāṃ tṛptilakṣaṇaṃ phalamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:499_4: phalamiti cet pūrveṇāviśeṣaḥ / yaduktaṃ saṃsārābhāvaprasaṃga iti tadanapahṛtameva
GSP31yuktdipu:499_5: bhavati / kiṃcānyat- śrūyamāṇaphalavirodhaśca / yacca kriyāyāḥ phalaṃ śrūyate agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmo,
GSP31yuktdipu:500_0: rāṣṭramagniṣṭomena jayatīti tadvirudhyate / karmaṇaśca śeṣabhāvaḥ / svārthopasarjanatve
GSP31yuktdipu:500_2: taddvāreṇa yajerupakurvantyastaccheṣabhūtā bhavanti evaṃ kriyāpi jñānaphalabhūtatvāttaccheṣabhūtā syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:502: nāsti vidhikṛto viśeṣaḥ / upetya vā / tatrāpi tadutpatteḥ / asti hi jñānasyāpi vidhāyakaṃ śāstram / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:503_0: evaṃ hyāha- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijighatso vipipāso vijaro vimṛtyurviśokaḥ sannyastasaṃkalpaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:503_1: so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa jijñāsitavyaḥ / sarvāṃśca kāmānavāpnoti ya ātmānamanuvidya vijānātīti”
GSP31yuktdipu:503_2: prajāpatervacanaṃ śrūyate / punarapyāha- “dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca”
GSP31yuktdipu:504: eke punarācāryā manyante dṛṣṭameva jñānasyājñānanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ tasmānna śāstreṇa vidhīyate / kiṃ kāraṇam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:505_0: dṛṣṭārthasya hi karmaṇo na śāstraṃ prayojakam / svayamevārthitatvāttatra pravṛtterbhujyādivat /
GSP31yuktdipu:508_0: śrotriyasya ca karmaṇyadhikāra iti tasyāmayamarthaḥ- adhītya vedaṃ kriyānupūrvo ca
GSP31yuktdipu:508_1: jñātvā karmaṇi pravartitavyam / evaṃ ca sati na kaściddoṣaḥ / yadi punarniyamata
GSP31yuktdipu:509_0: apara āha- satyam / nāstyanayoḥ samuccayaḥ kintarhi sarvārthā kriyā jñānaṃ pratiṣiddhārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:509_1: ye hi ṣaṇḍhāndhavabadhirādayaḥ karmaṇo 'tyantaṃ nirākṛtāsteṣāṃ jñānādāśramāntare
GSP31yuktdipu:509_2: 'mṛtatvāvāptiḥ / itareṣāṃ tū mūlāśrame karmaṇa eveti tasya nāyaṃ vādinaḥ parihāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:511: svasamayavirodhāt / evaṃ bruvāṇasyāsya vādinaḥ svasamaya eva virudhyate / yaduktam- vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ nākāmayanta,
GSP31yuktdipu:513: atha yaduktaṃ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāya bhaikṣacaryāṃ carantīti / na ca ṣaṇḍānāṃ putraiṣaṇāvyutthānamathavad bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:514_0: devakṛtatvāt / kiṃ cānyat - rahasyabhūtatvāt / rahasyabhūtaṃ hi vedānāṃ jñānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:514_1: yasmādāha- taddha smaitadāruṇirauddālakirjyeṣṭhāya putrāya provāca / idaṃ jyeṣṭhaputrāya
GSP31yuktdipu:514_2: pitā brahma prabrūyāt / praṇāyyāntevāsine nānyasmai yasmai kasmaicana / ya imāmadbhiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:514_3: parigṛhītāṃ vasunā vasumatīṃ pūrṇāṃ dadyādetadeva tato bhūya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:520: sa eva vartyatāṃ prājñaiḥ kiṃ nyāyyo 'tha matibhramaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:525: vidyā kanyeva ṣaṇḍāya dīyamānā na śobhate //
GSP31yuktdipu:528: iti śrīmadācāryeśvarakṛṣṇaviracitāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatau yuktidīpikānāmni vivaraṇe prathamamāhnikam //
GSP31yuktdipu:532: āha- samyagupadiṣṭaṃ bhavatā vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānānmokṣo 'vāpyate / idānīmupadeṣṭavyam kathametattrayaṃ pratipattavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:533: ucyate - trayasyāsya pratipattiṃ dvedhā samāmananti / samāsato vistarataśca / tadeva trayaṃ paṃcabhiradhikaraṇairbhidyate / kāni punaradhikaraṇānīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:538_1: tadbhedānvakṣyāmaḥ / tatpunaścaturdhā bhidyate / kiṃcitkāraṇameva na kāryam / kiṃcitkāraṇaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:538_2: ca kāryaṃ ca / kiṃcitkāryameva na kāraṇam / kiṃcinnaiva kāraṇaṃ na cāpi kāryamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:539: āha- atisāmānyopadiṣṭametannāsmākaṃ buddhāvavatiṣṭhate / tasmādvibhajyopadiśyatāṃ kasya padārthasya kiṃ vṛttamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:542: mūlamādhāraḥ pratiṣṭhetyanarthāntaram / prakarotīti / prakṛtiḥ / mūlaṃ cāsau prakṛtirmūlaprakṛtiḥ / mūlaprakṛtiḥ kasya mūlam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:543: mahadādīnām / saṃjñā khalviyaṃ pradhānasya mūlaprakṛtiriti / sā cāvikṛtiravikārānutpādyetyarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:544_0: āha- samāsānupapattiḥ viśeṣaṇāntaropādānāt / mūlamityayaṃ śabdaḥ prakṛtiviśeṣaṇārthamupātto
GSP31yuktdipu:544_2: prāpnoti / samāsāntaravidhānādadoṣa iti cetsyānmatam- yadyetasmin samāse doṣo 'yamupapadyate
GSP31yuktdipu:544_3: samāsāntaramatra vidhāsyate mūlaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ mūlaprakṛtiriti / etaccānupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:545: doṣāntaropapatteḥ / evamapyupasarjanaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti ṣaṣṭhyoktasyopasarjanatvātpūrvanipātaḥ / tatraivaṃ bhavitavyaṃ mūlaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ prakṛtimūlamiti / tasmādidamapyasāramiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:547_0: sambandhiśabdaḥ sāpekṣo nityaṃ vṛttau samasyate / yattūktaṃ viśeṣaṇāntaropādānātsamāsānupapattiriti-
GSP31yuktdipu:547_1: tatra brūmaḥ sambandhiśabdānāṃ sambandhyantaramanapekṣya svarūpapratilambha eva nāstītyākāṃkṣāvatāmeva
GSP31yuktdipu:547_3: 'pi guruśabdaḥ kulaśabdena saha vṛttiṃ pratipadyate / evamihāpi mūlamityayaṃ śabdaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:547_4: sambandhiśabdatvānmahadādyapekṣo 'pi prakṛtiśabdena saha vṛttiṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:547_5: kiñcānyat / vākyapratipādyasyārthasya vṛttāvupalabdheḥ / yatra hi vākyapratipādyo
GSP31yuktdipu:547_6: 'rtho vṛttyā na labhyate yathā ṛddhasya rājñasya puruṣaḥ iti tatra saviśeṣaṇānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:547_7: vṛttirneti vyavasthitaṃ śāstre / gamyate ceha vākyapratipādyo 'rtho vṛttāvapi satyām /
GSP31yuktdipu:547_8: tasmādadoṣo 'yamiti / kiṃ ca jñāpakāt / jñāpakaṃ khalvapi “karmavatkarmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ” /
GSP31yuktdipu:548: āha- avayavasya pratyavamarśānupapattiḥ saṃjñāśabdatvāt / saṃjñāśabdeṣu hi nāvayavasya parāmarśo bhavati / tadyathā gajakarṇo 'śvakarṇaḥ / kasya gajasya kasyāśvasyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:550: arthopapatteḥ / yatra hyartha upapadyate bhavatyeva tatra saṃjñāśabdeṣvayavaparāmarśaḥ / tadyathā saptaparṇānyasya parvaṇi parvaṇi,
GSP31yuktdipu:551: aṣṭau padānyasya paṅktau paṅktau saptaparṇo 'ṣṭāpadamiti / upapadyate cehāyamarthaḥ, tasmādadoṣo 'yam /
GSP31yuktdipu:552: āha- mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ, prakṛtiriti vaktavyam / yadāha mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:553: ucyate- prakṛtitvāvacanam / prakṛtitvaṃ ca mūlaprakṛterna vaktavyam / kiṃ kāraṇam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:554: arthādāpatteḥ / mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirityeva siddham / ucyamānaṃ hi tadanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:556: tadbhāvaḥ prakṛtitvam / tacca sati kārye na ghaṭate / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:558_0: ucyate- taditaratrāpi tulyam / yathaiva hi satāmātmādīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ nopapannamevamasatāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:558_1: śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmapīti nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ / tṛtīyā tu viṣādāvalyaiva koṭiḥ / evamubhayapakṣavyudāsātsvapakṣasiddhiriti
GSP31yuktdipu:558_2: cet athāpi syāt- sadasatoḥ kriyāsambandhaṃ pratyaviśeṣa upadarśyate bhavatā / tenobhayorapi
GSP31yuktdipu:558_3: pakṣayorvyudāsaḥ kṛto bhavati / na cobhayapakṣavyudāsātsvapakṣasiddhiriti / etaccāyuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:559: uttaratra pratiṣedhāt / sa khalveṣa vādī satkāryavādaṃ pratyācaṣṭe tasmātsvaka evainamadhikāre nivartayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:560_0: āha- avikṛtyabhidhānānarthakyam / mūlaprakṛtitvāttatsiddheḥ / yadi mūlaṃ sarvāsāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:560_1: prakṛtīnām avikṛtyaiva tayā bhavitavyam / itarathā hi mūlaprakṛtitvānupapattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:560_2: yadi khalvapi pradhānasyāpi prakṛtyantaraṃ syānmūlaprakṛtitvaṃ nopapannaṃ bhavet /
GSP31yuktdipu:561_0: ucyate- na / anavasthāprasaṃganivṛttyarthatvāt / yathā hi mūlādīnāṃ bījaṃ prakṛtistasyāpyanyattasyāpyanyadityanavasthā
GSP31yuktdipu:561_1: evaṃ mahadādīnāṃ pradhānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiḥ tasyāpyanyadityanavasthā prasajyeta / sā
GSP31yuktdipu:564: na tu heturatropadiṣṭo bhavadbhiḥ / na cānupadiṣṭahetukaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratipattuṃ nyāyyam / tasmādayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:566: kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhāt / puruṣākartṛtvātpradhānākhyānāṃ guṇānāṃ cāvasthāntarānupapatteravikṛtitvasiddhiḥ / ihārabhyamāṇā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇāntarairīśvarādibhirārabhyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:570_0: pratiṣedhāt / yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:570_1: idānīṃ sattvaṃ rajastamaḥ puruṣa iti padārthacatuṣṭayaṃ pratijñāyate / tatrāpi puruṣakartṛtvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:571: yasyedaṃ pradhānalakṣaṇamavasthāntaraṃ kāryaṃ syāt / tasmātsuṣṭhūcyate mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:573: mahānādyo yāsāṃ tā mahadādyāḥ / avayavena vigrahaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:574_0: samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ / anyathā mahānevātrāparigṛhītaḥ syāt / prakṛtayaśca vikṛtayaśca
GSP31yuktdipu:574_1: prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ / kāraṇāni kāryāṇi cetyarthaḥ / tatra mahānahaṃkārasya prakṛtiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:576_0: ucyate- saptagrahaṇamavadhiparicchedārtham / akriyamāṇe hi saptagrahaṇe na jñāyate
GSP31yuktdipu:577: āha- naitadasti prayojanam / pariśeṣasiddheḥ / iha bhavatāṃ pañcaśikhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatistattvāni / tatra mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirityuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:578: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣa iti vakṣyati / pariśeṣataḥ saptaivāvaśiṣyante / tasmānnārthastadarthena saptagrahaṇena /
GSP31yuktdipu:579: ucyate- ahaṃkāraparigrahārtham / evaṃ tarhi naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti patañjaliḥ / mahato 'smipratyayarūpatvābhyupagamāt / tatparihārārthametad bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:581: na / uttaratra parigrahāt / etadasti nāsti prayojanam / vakṣyati hi mahatā kaṇṭhenopariṣṭādācāryaḥ “prakṛtermahāṃstato 'haṅkāra” (ISk 22)
GSP31yuktdipu:583: ucyate- rūpabhede 'pi tattvābhedajñāpanārtham / evaṃ tarhi dharmādīnyaṣṭau rūpāṇi buddhervakṣyamāṇāni,
GSP31yuktdipu:584: ahaṃkāraśca vaikārikataijasabhūtādirūpatvāt trilakṣaṇo vakṣyamāṇaḥ / tatra rūpabhedāttattvabhedo mā bhūdityevamarthaṃ saptagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:586: hetumantareṇāpratipatteḥ / kaṇṭhoktamapi yuktimantareṇa na tarkaśīlāḥ pratipadyante kimpunaḥ kleśopapāditam / tasmādatra samādhirvācyaḥ kathamanekarūpā buddhirekaiveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:588: uttaratra vicāraṇāt / uttaratraitadvicārayiṣyāmaḥ kimanekarūpāvirbhāve 'pi tadeva tadvastu bhavati āhosvidrūpabhedāttattvabhedaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:589: tasmādiha tāvaddṛśyatāmiti siddhaṃ mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:591: ṣoḍaśaparimāṇasya so 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśakaḥ saṃghaḥ / tasya parimāṇaṃ saṃkhyāyāḥ saṃjñāsaṃghasūtrādhyayaneṣviti kanpratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:596_0: mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapteti hyupadiṣṭaṃ purastāt / tato 'haṅkāratamātrapūrvakatve
GSP31yuktdipu:596_1: siddhe sati indriyamahābhūtaparvaṇoḥ punaḥ śruterniyamo bhaviṣyati / tadyathā pañca
GSP31yuktdipu:596_2: pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ityatra kṣutpratīkārasamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāmarthādeva sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇe
GSP31yuktdipu:597: tadvadidaṃ draṣṭavyam / iṣṭato 'vadhāraṇārthaṃ iti cet syānmatam / iṣṭato 'vadhāraṇārthastarhi tuśabdo bhaviṣyati / kathaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti yathā vijñāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:598_0: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāra ityevaṃ mā jñāyīti / yadyevamasthāne tarhi tuśabdaḥ paṭhitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:598_1: ṣoḍaśako vikārastviti vaktavyam / atha mataṃ vṛttaparipūranārthamayamasminpradeśe
GSP31yuktdipu:598_2: paṭhitastuśabdo yatra nirdoṣastatraivāyaṃ draṣṭavya iti / etadanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:599_0: asandehāt / mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ saptetyapadiṣṭe kimiti sāṃśayikā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:599_1: tasmātpelavamasya pāṭhe prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ / athāyamabhiprāyaḥ syāt yadyapyetadarthataḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:599_2: siddhaṃ tathāpyayamācāryaḥ sphuṭapratipattyarthamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyādriyate / kiṃ kāraṇam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:600: yasmāt vicitrāḥ sūtrakārāṇāmabhiprāyagatayaḥ / tadyathā bhagavān pāṇiniḥ na kye,
GSP31yuktdipu:601_0: rātsasyetyevamādiṣvantareṇa prayatnamiṣṭato 'vadhāraṇe siddhe anyatra ajādī guṇavacanādeva
GSP31yuktdipu:601_1: stautiṇyoreva ṣaṇyabhāsādityevamādiṣu yatnaṃ karoti / tadvadihāpi draṣṭavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:602: aśakyatvāt / sati vā punaravadhāraṇārthatve tuśabdasya kathamivātra śakyamavadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum ?
GSP31yuktdipu:603_0: yāvatā mahābhūtānāmapi śarīrādilakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhyata iti / tatra kecit samādhimāhuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:604: aviśeṣāt / sarvameva hi sāṃkhyānāṃ kāryamanarthāntarabhūtam / tatraitasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvatattvānāmaprakṛtitvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:606: satkāryavyāghātaḥ / anye punarāhuḥ- apariṇāmitvānmahābhūtānāṃ viakaritvānavadhāraṇamiti / tadapyanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:607: pratyakṣopalabdheḥ / pratyakṣata evopalabhyate mahābhūtānāṃ kalilāṅkurakṣīrādipariṇāmaḥ / anumānagrāhyastu tattvāntarāṇām / tadetadadharottaraṃ bhavati / tasmādayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:608: āha - na tarhi idaṃ pratipattavyaṃ ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:609_0: ucyate- pratipattavyam / kiṃ kāraṇam / tattvāntarānupapatteḥ / iha puruṣārthena hetunā
GSP31yuktdipu:609_1: sāmyātpracyutānāṃ guṇānāṃ yo 'yaṃ mahadādirviśeṣānto vipariṇāmaḥ sa tattvāntarotpattiniyamena
GSP31yuktdipu:609_2: vyavatiṣṭhate / na tu pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntarotpattirasti / tasmādeteṣāṃ vikāratvameveti /
GSP31yuktdipu:609_3: kiṃ cānyat / grāhakāntarābhāvāt / yathā tanmātrairārabdheṣu pṛthivyādiṣu ahaṃkārāttadyogyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:610_0: naivaṃ pṛthivyādivikārāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ grāhakāntaramasti / tasmānna tattvāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:610_1: ataśca pṛthivyādayo vikārā eveti / kiṃ cānyat / pradhāne prakṛtibhāvapratyastamayavatteṣu
GSP31yuktdipu:614: puruṣo na hyayamavasthāntaraṃ pratipadyate / no khalvapyavasthāntarasyāvasthāntaraṃ bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:615: āha- naitadyuktimantareṇa śraddhīyate, tasmādupapādyatāṃ kathamasyāprakṛtitvamavikṛtitvaṃ ceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:616: ucyate- prakṛtitvānupapattiḥ / uttaratra pratividhānāt / tasmācca viparyāsādityatra (ISk 19)
GSP31yuktdipu:617: yuktimupadekṣyāmaḥ / tasmāttāvadasyāprakṛtitvam / avikṛtitvaṃ pradhānavat / yathā pradhānamevamayamapi puruṣaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ kāraṇāntarairīśvarādibhirnārabhyate / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:618_0: pratiṣedhāt / yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:618_1: puruṣāntaraiḥ samatvāt / samāḥ sarve puruṣāḥ / na ca samānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:618_2: kiṃ ca niṣkriyatvāt śuddhatvāccaiṣāṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā parispandalakṣaṇā vā kriyā
GSP31yuktdipu:619_0: eṣāmitaretarānārambhakatvāt / na guṇairbhinnajātīyakatvāt / ihācetanā guṇā ityetatpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:619_1: yacca yenārabhyate tacca tanmayaṃ bhavati / yadi guṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāmārambhaḥ tadā teṣāmapyacetanatvaṃ syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:620: cetanāstu te / tasmānna guṇairārabhyanta iti siddhametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:621_0: kiṃcitkāraṇameva na kāryam / kiṃcitkāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca / kiṃcitkāryameva / kiṃcinnaiva
GSP31yuktdipu:621_1: kāraṇaṃ naiva kāryamiti caturvidhaṃ kāraṇavṛttaṃ pratipāditam / etetpratijñāpiṇḍasūtram /
GSP31yuktdipu:628: pramīyate taditi prameyam / prameyasya siddhiḥ prameyasiddhiḥ / siddhiradhigamo 'vabodha ityarthaḥ / pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇam / karaṇasādhano lyuṭ / tadekameva,
GSP31yuktdipu:631: vrīhyādivat / yathā vrīhyāti prameyaṃ prasthādinā pramāṇena paricchidyate evamihāpi vyaktādiprameyaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇena paricchidyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:634_0: āha- yadyevaṃ hiśabdāvacanam / avadhāraṇānupapatteḥ / na hyetasmin sūtre kathaṃcidavadhāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:634_1: tasmādavacanameva hiśabdasya nyāyyam / prameyasyaiveti cet- na / anyasyāsambhavāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:634_2: sati hi vyabhicārasambhave vastvavadhāryate - tadyathā gaurevāyaṃ nāśvaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:635_0: devadatta evāyaṃ na yajñadatta iti / na ca prameyāprameyayoḥ pramāṇaparicchedyatve
GSP31yuktdipu:635_1: 'sti prasaṃgaḥ yannivṛttyarthaṃ prameyasyaivetyavadhāryate / pramāṇebhya eveti cenna-
GSP31yuktdipu:635_3: vaḥ pakṣaḥ / sāṃsiddhikāśca bhāvāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtāśca dharmādyā (ISk 43)
GSP31yuktdipu:636_0: iti vacanāt / ubhayāvadhāraṇe sati ubhayorapi pakṣayorye doṣāste prasajyante / tasmādayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:636_1: siddhireveti cenna anekāntāt / kadāciddyayaṃ pramātā sannihite 'pyādityādau liṅge
GSP31yuktdipu:637: ucyate- yaduktaṃ hiśabdāvacanamavadhāraṇānupapatteriti astu pramāṇebhya evetyavadhāraṇam / yattūktamārṣajñānavirodhaprasaṃga iti ayamadoṣaḥ / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:638: siddharūpatvāt / sādhyamānarūpāṇi hi vastūni nāntarīyakatvāt svarūpaniṣpattaye sādhanasambandhaṃ pratyākāṃkṣāvanti bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:639_0: siddharūpaṃ tu bhagavataḥ paramarṣerjñānam / tasmādasya sādhanasambandhaṃ pratyākāṅkṣā
GSP31yuktdipu:639_1: nopapadyata iti / athavā punarastu siddhirevetyavadhāraṇam / yattūktamanekāntāditi
GSP31yuktdipu:640: sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvāniyamāt / tamaḥprakarṣasāmagryātpramāṇavaikalyopapatteḥ / iha sattvādīnāmaniyato 'ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ / deśakālanimittasāmarthyāddhi kadācitsattvaṃ prakṛṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:642_0: kadācittamaḥ / sattvaprakarṣaśca prakāśarūpatvātpramāṇam / tatra yadā tamaḥ prakṛṣyate
GSP31yuktdipu:642_1: tadā tenābhibhūtatvāt sattvasya tatkāryamanumānaṃ trikālāṅgamuttiṣṭhate / ityataḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:642_3: na svarūpahānam / yasya tu niṣpattivaikalyātpramāṇapratibandho neṣṭaḥ tasya svarūpahānaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:643: etāvaddhi teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ yaduta prameyaparicchedaḥ / tasmādyuktametadavadhāraṇārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:644: āha- bahūni pramāṇānyācāryairabhyupagamyante tāni sarvāṇi kiṃ bhavānanumanyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:648_0: tisro vidhā asya tattrividhaṃ triprakāramityarthaḥ / anenaitadācaṣṭe- ekameva buddhilakṣaṇaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:648_2: pratyavabhāsamānaṃ dṛṣṭādiśabdavācyaṃ bhavati / na tu yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ viṣayopanipātibhirindriyairupajanitāvadhyo
GSP31yuktdipu:648_3: buddhayastatheha vidyante yāḥ parikalpyamānāḥ svatantrāṇi trīṇi pramāṇāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:649: syānmatam, kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmakavastusanniveśarūpabhedā bhavantīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:650: ucyate- sattvādivat / yathā sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāmekaśabdādivastusanniveśe 'pi prakāśādikāryabhedādrūpasaṃkaro na bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:652: yathā vā kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇasampradānāpādānakarmalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmekadravyasanniveśe 'pi kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnāni svarūpāṇi na saṃkīryante,
GSP31yuktdipu:654: anabhyupagamāt / na hi kṣaṇabhaṅgasāhasaṃ yuktimantareṇa daṇḍabhayādapi pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:655: na tu tasyāmavasara iti sthīyatāṃ tāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:656: āha, kathaṃ punaretad gamyate yathā trividhameva pramāṇaṃ na punaranekavidhamapīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:659_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni pramāṇāni sarvapramāṇāni / siddhasya bhāvaḥ siddhatvam / sarvapramāṇānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:659_1: siddhatvaṃ sarvapramāṇasiddhatvam / siddhatvamantarbhāva ityarthaḥ / tasmāt sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:659_2: tasminneva trividhe pramāṇa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / sarveṣāṃ paraparikalpitānāṃ pramāṇānāmasminneva
GSP31yuktdipu:659_4: athavā sarvapramāṇeṣu siddhaṃ sarvapramāṇasiddhaṃ- saptamī siddhaśuṣkapakvabandhairiti samāsaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:660: yathā sāṃkāśyasiddhaḥ pāṭaliputrasiddha iti / tadbhāvaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvaṃ tasmāt sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt / kasya trividhasya pramāṇasyeti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:662: ucyate- parasparaviśeṣāt / anyāni punarasmāt trayāt yathābhinnāni tathā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:666_0: iti / tatra dṛṣṭaṃ nāma upāttaviṣayendriyavṛttyupanipātī yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ / anumānaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:666_1: dvayoravinābhāvinorekaṃ pratyakṣeṇa pramāya tatpūrvakaṃ sambandyantare yat paścānmānaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:666_2: bhavati / āptavacanaṃ tu pramāṇabhūtadvārako 'tyantaparokṣe 'rthe niścayaḥ / ityuddeśamātramidam /
GSP31yuktdipu:666_3: mūlalakṣaṇaṃ tu ācāryo vakṣyati svayameva prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:669: nyūnādhikaśravaṇāt / tantrāntarīyāḥ kecit catvāri pramāṇānīcchanti / pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇānīti vacanāt / tathā ṣaḍityanye /
GSP31yuktdipu:672: ityabhidhānāt / etāni sambhavaitihyaceṣṭāsahitāni navetyapare / pratyakṣānumāne eveti vaiśeṣikabauddhāḥ / tatra kathamidaṃ niścīyate trividhameva pramāṇaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:678_1: gavayaḥ sa tasyopalabdhyarthamadhigatagavayaṃ paryanuyuṅkte kiṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:678_2: sa tasmā ācaṣṭe- yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti / tatra pratipattyātyantānupalakṣitagavayasvarūpo
GSP31yuktdipu:678_5: pratyakṣeṇa tamupalabhya yā samākhyāsambandhapratipattiḥ- ayamasāvartho 'sya śabdasya
GSP31yuktdipu:680_0: āptopadeśasiddheḥ / yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti cāptopadeśabalāt pratipattā aprasiddhaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:680_1: gavayamupalabhate na sādharmyamātrāt / tasmānna śabdāt pṛthagupamā / yattu khalviti
GSP31yuktdipu:680_2: ha uvāca yājñavalkyasya ityetadaitihyaṃ nāma pramāṇāntaramupakalpyate tadapi vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣatvānna śabdādarthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:682: na / sādharmyāpekṣatvāt / yadi hyāptopadeśa upamā syāttena yathā svarge 'psarasaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:683_0: uttarāḥ kurava ityevamādiṣvantareṇa sādharmyopādānaṃ pratipattirbhavati evamihāpi
GSP31yuktdipu:683_1: syāt / gavayantu ayamākhyātā pratipādayiṣyan prasiddhasādharmyagarbhaṃ śabdamupādatte
GSP31yuktdipu:683_2: na kevalam / pratipattāpi tasmādeva pratipadyate na śabdamātrāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:684: tasmātpṛthagevāsyopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ / śabdavyāpārāttadantarbhāva iti cet syānmatam śabdavyāpārasahito 'yaṃ prasiddhasādharmyalakṣaṇārtho gavayapratipattau na kevalaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:689_4: kartavyam / kiṃca vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣatvāt / yatra hyarthavaśātpratipattirutpadyate na
GSP31yuktdipu:689_6: asti copamāne vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣā / tasmānna śabdādarthāntaraṃ tat / avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:689_7: vijñeyam / yo hi manyate prasiddhasādharmyādeva gavayapratipattiriti yathāśvastathā
GSP31yuktdipu:689_8: gavaya ityetasmādapi tasya sampratipattiḥ syāt / na cārhati bhavituṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:690: mithyājñānatvāt / yattu khalvidamucyate yataḥ samākhyāsambandhapratipattiriti tadupamānamiti / etadanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:691_0: anavasthāprasaṃgāt / tadyathā bahuṣu niṣaṇṇeṣu ko 'tra devadatta ityukte yo mukuṭī
GSP31yuktdipu:691_1: kuṃḍalī vyūḍhoraskastāmrāyatākṣa iti pratyāha / tataśca samākhyāsambandhapratipattiriti
GSP31yuktdipu:691_2: pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅga ityevamanavasthā pramāṇānāṃ syāt / aniṣṭaṃ caitat / evaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:691_3: hi na tāvat parata upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram / yadā svayameva gāṃ gavayaṃ copalabhya
GSP31yuktdipu:691_4: vikalpayati yathāyaṃ tathāyamiti tadā tasyārthasya pramāṇāntareṇādhigatatvāt pramāṇameva
GSP31yuktdipu:692_3: guḍaśabdaṃ śrutvā mādhuryamaśabdakaṃ pratipadyata iti / aparā khalvārthāpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:692_4: yatra dharmayoravyabhicāramupalabhya tatpratidvandvinorapi sāhacaryakalpanā / sā tu dvividhā,
GSP31yuktdipu:693_0: vyabhicāriṇī cāvyabhicāriṇī ca / tatra vyabhicāriṇī yathā sāvayavamanityamityukte
GSP31yuktdipu:693_2: na bhavatīti / yā tvavinābhāvinī avyabhicāriṇī yathā kesarivarāhayorupagahvare sannipātamupalabhyottarakālaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:693_3: kevalaṃ kesariṇaṃ varāhavraṇāṃkitaśarīraṃ prayāntamupalabhya pratipadyate jito varāha
GSP31yuktdipu:694: yasmātkesarivarāhayoryau jayaparājayau tayoravyabhicārī sambandhaḥ / tatra yadā kesariṇo jayamupalabhyāvyabhicāriṇamitarasya parājayaṃ pratipadyate kimanyatsyādṛte 'numānāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:695: adhigatobhayasambandhisamudāyasya hi pratipattuḥ pratyakṣībhūtānyatarasambandhino yā sambandhyantarapratipattistadanumānam / itthaṃ cārthāpattirato na tasmātpṛthagbhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:696: sambhavo nāma droṇaḥ prastha ityukte 'rdhadroṇādīnāṃ sannidhānamavasīyate / ityayamapi sāhacaryakalpanayārthāpattireva / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:698: na nyūne nādhike / tatra droṇa ityukte yadatyantasahabhuvāṃ tadavayavānāmanyaśabdavācyānāmapi sannidhānam tadarthāpattireva / sa cānumānamityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:699_0: abhāvo nāma tadyathā dhūmasya bhāvādagnerbhāvaḥ pratīyate evaṃ dhūmābhāvādagnyabhāva
GSP31yuktdipu:699_2: tadā pramāṇābhāva eva / tadyathāyoguṇāṅgārādiṣu dhūmābhāvo nāgnyabhāvaḥ / yatra tu
GSP31yuktdipu:699_3: kvacidekāntaḥ syāt yathākṛtakatvānnitya iti tatrānumānam / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:701: anye tu abhāvamanyathā varṇayanti / tadyathā gehe nāsti caitra ityukte bahirastīti sampratyayo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:703_0: yathaiva hi divā na bhuṅkte devadattaḥ pīna ityatrābhojanapratiyogino meduratvasyopalambhāddivāpratiyogini
GSP31yuktdipu:703_1: kāle rātrau bhujiravasīyate evamihāpi gehābhāvābhidhānasāmarthyāttatpratiyogini viparyayaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:703_2: kalpyate / anyathā tu yadyabhāva evābhipretaḥ syānnāsti caitra eveti brūyāt / arthāpattiścānumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:704: ceṣṭā nāma abhiprāyasūcakaḥ kaścidevodaratāḍanāñjalikaraṇādiḥ śarīravyāpāraḥ / sa hi bubhukṣādīnyapratīyamānāni pratipādayatīti pramāṇamityucyate / sa cānumānameva / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:705: yasmād bhojanecchādisahacaro hi vyāpāro 'nuṣṭhīyamāno yadi sahacāriṇaṃ gamayati tadā nānumānātpṛthagiti śakyaṃ pratijñātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:709_0: yo 'yamanādau saṃsāre devamanuṣyatiraścāmabhinne 'rthe bāhye stryādau pratyaye pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:709_1: kuṇapakāminībhakṣyādyākārabhedabhinnapratyaya itikartavyatāṅgamutpadyate sā hi pratibhā / tathā coktam-
GSP31yuktdipu:712_0: yena hi yo 'rtho 'bhyastassukhāditvena tasya vināpi tenārthena śabdamātrāt pratipattirutpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:712_1: tadyathā vyāghro 'tra prativasatītyukte vināpi bāhyenārthenābhyāsavaśādeva svedavepathuprabhṛtayo
GSP31yuktdipu:715_1: yadi pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhetyupagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣamanumānamāptavacanaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:716: yato na dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣarūpaṃ kadācidapyupalabhāmahe / tasmānna tebhyo 'rthāntaraṃ pratibhā / ārṣapratyayasambhavādayuktamiti cet- syādetat,
GSP31yuktdipu:717: astyārṣo hi dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa sarvapadārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ / sa prātibho bhaviṣyatīti / etaccāpyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:718: uktatvāt / uktametat siddharūpaṃ bhagavataḥ paramarṣerjñānam / ato na pramāṇāpekṣamiti / yogināmiti cenna,
GSP31yuktdipu:719_0: anabhyupagamāt / na hi yogināmapramāṇapūrvakaṃ jñānamiti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:719_1: sa laukika iti cet na / aniścitatvāt / syādetat- asti laukikaḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa /
GSP31yuktdipu:719_2: tadyathā santamase vrajato drāgiti vijñānamutpadyate - asti me pratīghāti dravyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:720_0: aniścitatvāt / na hi tatra niścaya utpadyate idaṃ taddravyamasti purato vā vyaktamastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:720_1: na cāniścitaṃ pramāṇajñānamiṣyate / kiṃcānyat- anavasthāprasaṃgāt / yadi caivaṃjātīyato
GSP31yuktdipu:720_2: 'pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tenānavasthā prāpnoti / kiṃ kāraṇam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:721_1: yasmādaneka utpadyate tasmānna laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā / yattu khalvidamucyate-
GSP31yuktdipu:721_3: sā tu mithyājñānatvātpramāṇatvena na parigṛhyate ityayamadoṣaḥ / tasmāt siddhaṃ dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa
GSP31yuktdipu:725: āha- astvevametat / lakṣaṇānabhidhānāttadapratipattiḥ / tasmāttadabhidhānam / anavasthitaṃ hi dṛṣṭādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam,
GSP31yuktdipu:726_3: vārṣagaṇāḥ / kalpanāpoḍhamityanye / itthamanavasthitaṃ lakṣaṇam / iti dṛṣṭādīnāmapratipattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:729_0: viṣiṇvantīti viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ / athavā viṣīyante upalabhyante ityarthaḥ / te ca
GSP31yuktdipu:729_1: dvividhāḥ / viśiṣṭā aviśiṣṭāśca / viśiṣṭāḥ pṛthivyādilakṣaṇā asmadādigamyāḥ / aviśiṣṭāśca
GSP31yuktdipu:729_2: tanmātralakṣaṇā yogināmūrdhvasrotasāṃ ca gamyāḥ / vakṣyati caitadupariṣṭāt “buddhīndriyāṇi
GSP31yuktdipu:731: ca vakṣyati / viṣayaṃ prati vartata iti prativiṣayam / kintat ?
GSP31yuktdipu:732_0: indriyam / tasmin yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa prativiṣayādhyavasāyaḥ / upāttaviṣayāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:732_1: vṛttyupanipāti sattvodrekādarajastamaskaṃ yatprakāśarūpaṃ tad dṛṣṭamiti yāvat / tad
GSP31yuktdipu:736: adhigamarūpatvāt / adhigamarūpaṃ hi jñānaṃ, tasyotpattyaivādhigato 'rtha iti kutaḥ phalabheda iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:738: āha- karaṇabhāvastu prasiddhivaśāt / viṣayanirbhāsā hi jñānasyotpattiḥ adhigamarūpāpi loke savyāpāreva pratīteti kalpanayā karaṇabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:739: ucyate- phalasyārthāntarabhāvaḥ / adhikaraṇabhedāt / buddhyāśrayaṃ hi pramāṇamadhyavasāyākhyam,
GSP31yuktdipu:740: puruṣāśrayaṃ phalamanugrahalakṣaṇam / na ca bhinnādhikaraṇayorekatvamarhati bhavitum / yattūktamadhigamarūpatvāt jñānameva phalamiti tadanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:741: asiddhatvāt / yathaiva hi ghaṭādayo 'rthā jñānamantareṇa na tadrūpā nātadrūpā iti na śakyaṃ pratipattum,
GSP31yuktdipu:742: evaṃ jñānamapi puruṣapratyayamantareṇa na viṣayarūpaṃ nāviṣayarūpam / tathā ca śāstram- “tatsaṃyogādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva liṅgamiti” (ISk 20)
GSP31yuktdipu:743_0: vacanāt / ataḥ puruṣapratyayamantareṇa jñānamadhigamarūpamiti sāṃkhyaṃ pratyasiddhametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:743_1: ubhayapakṣaprasiddhena ca vyavahāraḥ / puruṣābhāvādayuktamiti cenna uttaratra pratipādanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:744: āha- yadi hyadhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ laukikaḥ prayogo 'rthavān bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vastu iti ?

GSP31yuktdipu:876: yathā śayanāsanarathaśaraṇānām / vyatirekastvavītasya prasaṅgidharmāntaranivṛttirūpatvāttadantarbhūta iti tadarthaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:878_2: yathā śayanādayaḥ saṃhatatvātparārthā evaṃ cakṣurādibhirapi parārthairbhavitavyam /

GSP31yuktdipu:880_2: ityetannyāyyam / na ca svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyamānasya jijñāsādīnāṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:880_3: tasmāt parārthamapyeṣāmupādānaṃ na kalpyate / saṃśayavacanānarthakyam ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:882_1: ca / sādhanābhyupagamādeva tatpratīteḥ / na hi mahatāṃ niṣprayojanā pravṛttirupapadyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:882_3: tadbhāve bhāvāditi cet syādetat satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamaṃ prati pravṛttirbhavati,

GSP31yuktdipu:884: atiprasaṃgāt / satsvātmāntaḥkaraṇendriyālokaviṣayeṣu pravṛttidarśanātteṣāmapi sādhanatvaṃ syāt / aniṣṭaṃ caitat / tasmājjijñāsādayo 'narthakāḥ / pratijñādayo durvihitāḥ / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:885: sādhyāvadhāraṇasyāvayavāntareṣvapyupapatteḥ / yadi sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñetyucyate tena sādhyasya hetordṛṣṭāntasya vā yadavadhāraṇaṃ tadapi pratijñā prāpnoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:886: nimittāviśeṣāt / sādhyaśabdo hyayaṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ / na yatnamantareṇa viśeṣe 'vasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti / kiṃ ca hetulakṣaṇānupapattiśca,
GSP31yuktdipu:887_0: sādhanānupadeśāt / yo hi sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ heturityetallakṣaṇamācaṣṭe tena prāksādhanamabhidheyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:887_1: syāt / tato vaktavyamamuṣya samāsavacanaṃ heturiti na caivamuktam / tasmādalakṣaṇametat / kiṃcānyat,

GSP31yuktdipu:888_2: sādhanaprapañcaḥ so 'heturityuktaṃ bhavati / tasmāt samāsagrahaṇamaniṣṭam / liṅgābhidhānādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:889: liṅgaṃ hi naḥ sādhanam / tasyātra nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ / tasmātsvamatijāḍyādidamaniṣṭamadhyāropyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:891_0: tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāt / taddhi liṅgaṃ vītāvītatveneṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:891_1: tena dvidhā bhinnam / tatrāpi vītaḥ pañcaprabhedaḥ ityataḥ samudāyānniṣkṛṣṭasyaikasya
GSP31yuktdipu:893: śabdārthalakṣaṇe 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāt / tannidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti / atra śabdo vā yena sādhyasādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:896: na tadyadi tāvacchabdaḥ parigṛhyate tata upanayalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:897_0: na hi yathābhidhānaṃ tathā sādhyamityekakriyā yujyate iti / athārthaḥ parigṛhyate
GSP31yuktdipu:898: te / pratijñārthaṃ ca nigamanasya nāvayavāntaratvaṃ yujyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:899: ucyate- yaducyate svaniścayenāṅgabhāvagamanātparapratyāyanārthaṃ jijñāsādyanabhidhānamiti atra brūmaḥ- na,
GSP31yuktdipu:900: uktatvāt / uktametat purastādvyākhyāṅgaṃ jijñāsādayaḥ / sarvasya cānugrahaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaṃ śāstravyākhyānaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:901_0: na svārthaṃ svasadṛṣabuddhyarthaṃ vā / tatraivaṃ kalpyamāne ye vyutpādyāstānprati
GSP31yuktdipu:901_2: hi satāṃ viniścayaḥ śāstrakathetyasya vyāghātaḥ / kiṃ ca niyamānabhyupagamāt / na
GSP31yuktdipu:902: kintarhi yadā prativādī paryanuyuṅkte- kiṃ jijñāsasa iti avaśyamabhidhānīyaṃ śabdamiti / kena dharmeṇa,
GSP31yuktdipu:905_0: mūrtatvāt / yastu na paryanuyuṅkte na taṃ pratyete vācyāḥ / kvacidānarthakyāt sarvatra
GSP31yuktdipu:905_1: prasaṅga iti cenna itareṣāmapi tatprasaṅgāt / pratijñādīnāmapi tarhi kvacidanabhidhānamatasteṣāmapi
GSP31yuktdipu:905_2: sarvatrāvacanaṃ prasajyate / tathā ca bhavatoktaṃ kasyacittu kiñcit prasiddhameva
GSP31yuktdipu:906: śabda ivārthadvayapratītatvādubhayānabhidhānamiti / yadapyuktaṃ niścitatvāt saṃśayāvacanamiti asadetat / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:907_0: uktatvāt / uktametat sati paryanuyoge tadvacanamiti / etena prayojanaśakyaprāptī
GSP31yuktdipu:907_1: pratyukte / yo hi paryanuyuñjīta kiṃ prayojano 'yaṃ śakyo vāyamartha iti taṃ prati
GSP31yuktdipu:908_0: anabhyupagamāt / na brūmo yasmāt satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamasadbhāvastasmādeteṣāmavayavatvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:908_1: kintarhi yaṃ pratyeṣāṃ pratipattāvaṅgabhāvagamanaṃ taṃ pratyetāni sādhanamiti / yadapyuktaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:908_2: sādhyābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñābhyupagamāddhetudṛṣṭāntayorapi tatprasaṅga iti ayuktametat / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:909_0: jijñāsādeḥ sadbhāve sati tatpratīteḥ / yadyapi sādhyaśabdo 'yamaviśeṣeṇa siddhatvādarthāntaramācaṣṭe
GSP31yuktdipu:909_1: tathāpi yaṃ prati jijñāsāsaṃśayaprayojanaśakyaprāptayastasya vyudasya saṃśayaṃ sādhyasyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā,
GSP31yuktdipu:910: na hetudṛṣṭāntayostadastītyasadetat / kiṃcānyat tadbhāve 'virodhāt / yadā tu jijñāsādayo hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti
GSP31yuktdipu:911: tadā kiṃ kṛtakaḥ śabdo 'tha na kṛtako 'tha buddhirnityā kṣaṇikā veti bhavatyeva tadavadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā / yadapyuktam sādhanānupadeśāddhetulakṣaṇāyoga iti asadetat / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:912: lokaprasiddhatvāt / yathā sādhyavatvenepsitaḥ pakṣa iti pratijñālakṣaṇamācakṣāṇo bhavānna sādhyalakṣaṇamācaṣṭe, kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:914: evaṃ sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetulakṣaṇamācakṣāṇā vayaṃ na sādhanamācakṣmahe / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:915: sādhyate 'neneti kṛtvā sādhanamiti loke siddhatvāt / upetya vānumānanirdeśāt / liṅgaṃ hi naḥ sādhanaṃ,

GSP31yuktdipu:921: na hi samāsaśabdasyāyamartha iti kṛtvā / yatpunaretaduktaṃ śabdārthakalpane 'niṣṭaprasaṅgād dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāyoga iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:922: astu tāvacchabdo dṛṣṭāntaḥ / yattūktaṃ upanayalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyata iti anupapannametat / kasmāt ?

GSP31yuktdipu:924_0: apratijñānāt / na hyetadasmābhiḥ pratijñāyate / kiṃ tarhi prameyavacanaṃ pratijñā /

GSP31yuktdipu:930_0: iha pratiṣedhamātramādāvucyate / tena yathā hetuvirodhātparamāṇvadibhyo na vyaktamutpadyate

GSP31yuktdipu:936_0: tatrātidūrāttāvat tadyathā proḍḍīnasya śakuneḥ / atisāmīpyādañjanaprabhṛtīnām / indriyaghātācchabdādīnām /
GSP31yuktdipu:936_3: na cārhati bhavituṃ dharmasāmānyānupapatteḥ / tasmādayuktaṃ sarvamatīndriyamanumānagrāhyamiti /

GSP31yuktdipu:961: dātramudīcyeṣu nānyatra / tasmānna śabdo liṅgam / kiṃcānyat,

GSP31yuktdipu:962_1: 'nyatra vā niveśayitum / śabdastu yatra vakturabhiprāyastatra tatra viniveśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:962_2: yatha vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārthābhyuccayādiṣu prasiddhā ādaikṣu viniveśyante / tasmānna te liṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:963: sarvābhidhānaśaktitvācchabdasyādoṣa iti cet syānmataṃ sarvābhidhānaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarvābhidheyaśaktiścārthastayoḥ puruṣavyāpāreṇa śaktyavavacchedaḥ kriyate / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:964_0: ayameva śabdo 'syārthasya pratyāyako bhavatu / ayameva cārtho 'nena śabdenābhidhīyatām /

GSP31yuktdipu:966_0: na hi yathā vakrapekṣayā sarvārthasya sataḥ śabdasya śaktyavacchedastathā sarvārthaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:966_1: liṅgaṃ vaktrapekṣayārthāntarādavacchidyate / yathā caikaḥ śabdo jagatyevamuditaḥ

GSP31yuktdipu:973_0: pathi guḍaśakaṭaṃ viparyastamiti / na ca svargādiśabdānāmarthaḥ pramāṇāntareṇopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:973_1: tasmādyathā vibhurātmā sarvatra sukhādisambhavādityevamādayo bauddhaṃ prati dharmyasiddhatvādayo
GSP31yuktdipu:973_2: yathārthāstathā vedaśabdā api prāyeṇeti / etattu na yuktarūpam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:974: anyāyena sarvaśabdāpavādāt / kā hyatra yuktiryadasmadādibhiranupalabhyamānārthaṃ pramāṇabhūtānāmapi vākyamayathārthaṃ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:975_0: saveṇa cāvaśyaṃ kaścidāptastasya ca vākyamadṛṣṭārthamityabhyupagantavyam / ato 'yaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:975_1: tavātrāpi samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ / na ca pramāṇaṃ svārthasiddhaye pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:975_2: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ yathārthatvamāśrīyate tena na kevalaṃ svargādayaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:975_3: kiṃ tarhi śabdā evāpramāṇamiti prāptam / anumānasya ca pramāṇāntaranirapekṣasya gamakatvābhyupagamādāgamasya
GSP31yuktdipu:975_4: tato 'rthāntaratvaṃ sutarāṃ prasajyate / tasmādyuktāgamavirodhina evaṃvidhā nāstikavādāḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:975_5: śreyo 'rthibhirdūrādapohyā iti sthitametat- anumānādasiddhaṃ vastu yattadāptāgamātsādhyamiti /

GSP31yuktdipu:1107: yasya punaḥ satkāryaṃ tasya doṣo nāsti / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1109_0: upādānamiti kāraṇaṃ tantvādyācakṣmahe / taddhi tasya kārakairgṛhyate abhisambadhyata
GSP31yuktdipu:1109_1: ityarthaḥ / tasmācca nārthāntaraṃ kāryam ityataḥ kāraṇenābhisambaddhānāṃ kārakāṇāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1110: āha- nanu ca yasyāpi satkāryaṃ tasyopādānādarthāntaraṃ tatkāryaṃ syāt / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1111_1: paṭaḥ / tantavaśca paṭādibhirupādīyante / tasmāttebhyo 'pyarthāntaraṃ paṭa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1111_2: etena sattvaṃ prayuktam / yadyadarthamupādīyate tattasminnasat / yathā vemādiṣu paṭa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1115_1: sambhavaḥ syāt / na tvevamasti / tasmātsarvasambhavābhāvādasamyagetat / kiṃcānyat,
GSP31yuktdipu:1116: jātibhedaprasaṃgādarthāntarārambhaprasaṅgācca upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato yathā vemādibhyo bhinnajātīyo bhinnadeśaśca,
GSP31yuktdipu:1117_0: tathā tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt yathā cāvasthite paṭe vemādayaḥ paṭāntaraṃ kurvanti tathā
GSP31yuktdipu:1117_1: hyavasthite paṭe tantavo 'pi paṭāntaramārabheran / na caitadiṣṭam / na tarhyupādānasāmānyādvemādivattantubhyaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1118: yatpunaretaduktaṃ yadyadarthamupādīyate na tat tatrāstīti, atra brūmaḥ- ayuktametat / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1119_0: ādhārādheyabhāvānabhyupagamāt / asakṛduktamasmābhirna tantuṣu paṭo nāma kaścidasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1119_1: kiṃ tarhi tantava eva paṭaḥ / tattu sanmārgavidveṣādbhavatā na gṛhyate / kiṃ cānyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1119_2: anekāntāt / upetya vā brūmaḥ kathaṃ tāvattilāstailārthamupādīyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:1121: bhavati cāsyāṃ rasaḥ / godhukca payo 'rthaṃ gāmādatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:1122: bhavati ca tasyāṃ kṣīram / śālikalāpaśca taṇḍulārthamupādīyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1124_0: āha- āvaraṇopalabdherayuktam / tilādiṣvāvaraṇaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate / tatpratibandhāttailādīnāmagrahaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1124_1: vyāpāraśca kartustadvigamārtho na tu kāryasyāvaraṇamasti / tasmādviṣamo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1126_0: mārgāntaratvāt / yadyatrāsti tatra tadarthamupādīyate iti pūrvaṃ bhavatātisṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1126_1: idānīṃ tvavagamavigamārthaṃ sato 'pyupādānamiti brūvato mārgāntaragamanaṃ pūrvavādatyāgo
GSP31yuktdipu:1126_2: 'naikāntikasya cāparihāra iti / yatpunaretaduktaṃ pariṇāmādyupapatteradoṣa iti tathā
GSP31yuktdipu:1126_3: tadastu / yattūktaṃ mārgāntarānupapatteriti atra brūmaḥ- etadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1127_1: vyaktamayamupālambhaḥ syāt / na tvanayānusṛtyā pratiṣṭhāmahe / kiṃ tarhi sādhanānugṛhītasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1127_2: dharmiṇo dharmāntarasyāvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ / na cāvirbhāvatirobhāvāvutpattinirodhau /
GSP31yuktdipu:1127_3: vyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayāstu kimasato dharmā uta svato 'santa iti vicāryam / kiṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1127_4: cātaḥ / yadi tāvadasato dharmāḥ yathā kasyeti vācyam / atha svayamasantaḥ paścādbhavanti
GSP31yuktdipu:1128: anarthāntaratvāt / satyarthāntarabhāve prāgasantaḥ paścādupalabhyamānāḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryuḥ / sa caiṣāmarthāntarabhāvo na prasiddhaḥ / tasmātkimatropapannam ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1129_0: grahaṇāgrahaṇavikalpe coktaḥ parihāraḥ / kiṃ cānyat / dravyāntarotpattivyāghātāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1129_1: upetya vaiṣāmutpattiṃ brūmaḥ- yadi hi pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayamātraṃ kāryamiṣyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1129_2: yaduktaṃ dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhanta iti tasya vyāghātaḥ / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1130: na hyete bhāvā dravyāntaram / tasmāddinakarakiraṇapratāpamūrchitasyeva dāvāgnyupasarpaṇadoṣonutāpāyaiva bhavataḥ pratipattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1132_0: ātmabhūtaṃ hi tantūnāṃ paṭākhyaṃ vyūhasthānīyaṃ sanniveśaviśeṣaṃ yadā kārakāṇi svena
GSP31yuktdipu:1132_1: svena vyāpāreṇāviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityevamādirlokasya vyavahāraḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1132_3: tadā prāgupalabdhaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate / paramārthatastu
GSP31yuktdipu:1132_4: na kasyacidutpādo 'sti na vināśaḥ / yatpunaretaduktaṃ janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasyārthasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1133_0: vivādāt / sadasadviṣayaṃ janmeti vivāde 'nuṣakte janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasya sadbhāvamācaṣṭa
GSP31yuktdipu:1133_1: iti brūvato 'nuktasamam / puruṣādāvadṛṣṭatvādasiddhiriti cet syādetat yadi tarhi
GSP31yuktdipu:1133_2: kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityeṣorthaḥ sadviṣayaḥ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1136_0: saṃsthānaviṣayatvāt / yadā bhāvaḥ svato 'narthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃsthānaṃ bhajate tadaite
GSP31yuktdipu:1136_1: śabdāḥ pravartanta ityuktam / dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke tadyathā muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalāni karoti janayatyutpādayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1137: abhivyaktātmasu ca mūlodakādiṣu bhavatyutpannaṃ jātamiti / ubhayapakṣaprasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇādau naite śabdāḥ pravartante / tasmādbhavata evāniṣṭaprasaṅga iti / uktaṃ ca
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_0: śaktaścāyamasyetyayaṃ niyamaḥ satāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ / tadyathā cakṣuṣo rūpasya / āsti cāyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_1: paṭasya vemādīnāṃ ca niyamaḥ / tasmācca satkāryam / sahakārivattanniyama iti cet
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_2: syānmatam yathāpo bījāṅkurasyotpattau samarthā bhavanti na kāṣṭhādagnervā / ubhayaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_3: ca tattāsu ca vidyate / bījādapāṃ vicchinnatvāt / yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntādagnimutpādayituṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_4: samartho na candrakāntācca pānīyam / ubhayaṃ tattatra na vidyate / tathā ca tattvādīnāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1144_5: paṭasyaiva śaktiniyamaḥ syāt / na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvaṃ syāditi / etaccāyuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1145_0: sādhyatvāt / aṃkurādayo 'pi kāryamabādīnām / ataḥ sādhyam / kimaṅkuro 'styatha nāstyeva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1145_1: tathā sūryakānte 'gniḥ / tadarthameva cāyaṃ vivādo 'nuṣaktaḥ / yattūktamapāṃ vicchinnavānna
GSP31yuktdipu:1145_3: sādhyam / ato na kiṃcidetat / kiṃ cānyat / rūpavyavasthānācca / tadyathā vijñānotpattihetutve
GSP31yuktdipu:1145_4: sati na rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nedānīṃ tatsāmānyāt rūpamapyarūpaṃ bhavati / evaṃ paṭakāraṇatvādvemādayo
GSP31yuktdipu:1145_5: na paṭa iti nedānīṃ tantavopyapaṭaḥ / tasmādyuktametacchaktasya śakyakaraṇātsatkāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1147_0: ihāsati kārye kāraṇabhāvo nāsti / tadyathā vandhyāyāḥ / asti ceha kāraṇabhāvastantupaṭayostasmātsatkāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1148: anabhyupagamāt / asataḥ kāryasyotpattireva na siddhā śaśaviṣāṇādiṣvasiddhatvāt / kutaḥ punastannimittākārabuddhiḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1150: asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇaṃ samavāyyasamavāyinimittalakṣaṇamasti / tasmātpaṭa ucyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1151: na śaśaviṣāṇasyeti / etaccāyuktam / kutaḥ hetvabhāvāt / asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇamasti na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyatra heturanuktaḥ / puruṣavaditi cet syādetat,
GSP31yuktdipu:1152: yathā tulyatve sattve paṭasya kāraṇamasti na puruṣasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:1153: evamasattve paṭasya saṃsthānaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyetadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1154_0: uktatvāt / saṃsthānaṃ kāryaṃ paṭasya / saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣasyetyuktaṃ prāk / saṃsthānavattadviśeṣa
GSP31yuktdipu:1154_1: iti cet syānmataṃ yathā sattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣa evamasattvāviśeṣe
GSP31yuktdipu:1154_2: paṭaḥ kāryaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇamiti / etadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1155_0: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvāt / sāmānyasya hi viśeṣaparigrahaḥ saṃsthānam / na tvayamasti cetanāśaktau
GSP31yuktdipu:1155_1: vikalpaḥ / tasmānna puruṣaḥ saṃsthānam / asatastu nirātmakatvādviśeṣo durupapādaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1155_2: tadupapattau vā sattvaprasaṃga iti / āha ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:1158: tasmādyuktametatkāraṇabhāvācca satkāryam / evaṃ tāvadvaiśeṣikamatenāsatkāryavādo na vimardasahaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1159: bauddhapakṣe tu bhūyāndoṣaḥ / kathaṃ tarhi dravyāntaraṃ paṭo neṣyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1160_1: 'pi na saṃyogibhyasteṣāmarthāntaramiṣṭaḥ / tatraitāvatī parikalpanā syāt- yaduta
GSP31yuktdipu:1162_0: ubhayaṃ ca teṣāṃ nārthāntaram / athotpattivināśau kasyāpīti māyākāraceṣṭitam / tadapi
GSP31yuktdipu:1162_2: vicāraḥ / tasmātpāramarṣa eva pakṣo jyāyān / yathā cāsatkāryaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā
GSP31yuktdipu:1163: parasparavirodhāt naiva sannāsaditi eke / etadapyanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1169: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ceti vacanādvairūpyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1171_0: sukhapratipattihetutvāt / adhigatasārūpyasya hi sukhaṃ vairūpyasya pratipattirbhavatīti
GSP31yuktdipu:1171_1: prāksārūpyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam / yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1172: ucyate- tadanupapattiḥ / aviśeṣāt / yathaivādhigatasārūpyasya laghīyasī vairūpyapratipattirevamadhigatavairūpyasya laghīyasī sārūpyapratipattiḥ / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1173: parasparāpekṣatvāt / vairūpyāpekṣaṃ hi sārūpyaṃ, sārūpyāpekṣaṃ ca vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1174: āha- evamapi vairūpyasya prāgabhidhāne prayojanavacanam / dvayoraviśeṣe 'nyatarasya prāgabhidhāne niyamaheturvaktavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1180: āha- yadi tarhi bhavānprāgvairūpyābhidhānaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyate tadvaktavyaṃ kiṃ punaridaṃ vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1184_0: tatra hetuḥ kāraṇamityanarthāntaram / tadasyāstīti hetumat / nityaṃ dhruvam / na
GSP31yuktdipu:1184_1: nityamanityam / vyāpnotīti vyāpi / na vyāpyavyāpi / asarvagatamityarthaḥ / saha kriyayā
GSP31yuktdipu:1184_2: sakriyam / anekaṃ bhinnam / āśritamādheyam / liṅgaṃ tallakṣaṇopapannam / avayūyanta
GSP31yuktdipu:1184_3: ityavayavāḥ / pṛthagupalabhyanta ityarthaḥ / sahāvayavaiḥ sāvayavam / paratantramanyādhīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1184_4: ete hetumadādayaḥ paratantrāntā nirapavādāḥ vyaktasyāsādhāraṇā pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ dharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1185: āha- hetumadityaviśeṣaḥ sarvatra sadbhāvāt / vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ heturastīti aviśeṣa evāyaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1187_0: kārakaparigrahāt / yadyapi vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāmaviśiṣṭaṃ hetumattvaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1187_1: kārakasya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ / sa ca vyaktasyaiva nānyasyeti nāyamaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1189_1: viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhanta iti viśeṣa upādeyaḥ syāt / sa tu nopādīyate / tasmātte aviśeṣā eveti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1191_0: sarvasambhavino 'bhidhānasya prakarṣārthatvāt / iha yaḥ sarvasaṃbhavī dharma ekaviṣaya
GSP31yuktdipu:1191_1: upādīyate tasmātprakarṣo vijñāyate / tadyathā bhoktā māṇavaka ityukte sarveṣāṃ bhoktṛtvasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1192: evamihāpi sarvasambhavītyāhācāryo vyaktaṃ hetumaditi / tena vayamasmātprakarṣaṃ vijñāsyāmaḥ / kaśca prakarṣaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1193_2: hetustasyeha grahaṇaṃ gamyate / kaścānityasahacaro hetuḥ ? kārakaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1195: ubhayatra tatsaṃbhavāt / utpādyavyaṅgyayorhi vināśaṃ paṭādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt avyabhicārāttantrāntarīyā manyante / tasya vā parihāro vaktavyaḥ / na vā vaktavyo viśeṣe sthitirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1197_0: ekāntavādaprasaṅgāt / sarveṇa hi vādināvaśyaṃ kiṃcinnityamabhyupagantavyam / antato
GSP31yuktdipu:1197_1: vināśe 'pi na kaścidarthaḥ śabdabuddhibhyāṃ na vyajyate / tathā satyekāntavādo 'yaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1197_2: syāt / sa ca yuktimadbhirneṣyate / tathā ca saṃskṛtamapyevaṃ kalpyamāne vināśi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1198_0: āha- anityatvānupapattiḥ satkāryavādābhyupagamāt / yathaiva hi nāsata utpattirastyevaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1198_1: sato 'pi vināśena na bhavitavyam / atha sato 'pi vināśo 'bhyupagamyate tena pralayakāle
GSP31yuktdipu:1198_2: vinaṣṭānāṃ tattvādīnāṃ praścādasatāmutpattiḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryāt / tasmādanityaṃ vyaktamityayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1199: ucyate- na, vyaktyapagamapratijñānāt / sadā vayaṃ sato 'vināśamācakṣāṇāḥ (na ?)
GSP31yuktdipu:1200_0: satkāryavādaṃ pratyācakṣīmahi / kāraṇānāṃ tu yaḥ parasparaṃ saṃsargāt saṃsthānaviśeṣaparigrahastasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1200_2: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- “tadetat trailokyaṃ vyakterapaiti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1201_0: na sattvādapetamapyasti vināśapratiṣedhāt / asaṃsargāccāsya saukṣmyaṃ saukṣmyāccānupalabdhistasmādvyaktyapagamo
GSP31yuktdipu:1201_1: vināśaḥ / sa tu dvividhaḥ- ā sargapralayāt tattvānāṃ kiñcitkālāntarāvasthānāditareṣām” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1203: vipratipatteḥ / sarvameva kṣaṇikaṃ buddhibodhyamākāśanirodhavarjitamiti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ / teṣāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyo vā na vaktavyaṃ dvividhamanityamiti / ucyate- na,
GSP31yuktdipu:1204: hetvanupagamāt / pratikṣaṇamucchidyate trailokyamityatra liṅgamabhiyuktā api nopalabhāmahe / tasmāt naitadasmākaṃ buddhāvavatiṣṭhata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1206: iha yasyānte kṣayastasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ dṛṣṭam / tadyathā,
GSP31yuktdipu:1207: pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdānām / asti cānte kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante / tadanupapattiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1208: sādhyatvāt / iha tu siddhenātideśo bhavati / tad yathā gavā gavayasya / na tu pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham / ato na kiñcidetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1210: vṛddhyadarśanāt / yadi hi avinaṣṭāyāṃ jvālāyāmindhanāntarāle jvālāntaramutpadyeta vṛddhirapi syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:1211_0: na tu dṛśyate / tasmādanavasthitā pradīpajvālā / kiñcāśrayābhāvāt / yadāśrayā jvālotpattistadutpadyamānaivāsau
GSP31yuktdipu:1211_1: niruṇaddhīti na yuktamasyā vināśrayeṇāvasthātum / upayuktendhanāyā apyavasthānaprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1211_3: prabhāyāstantoriva dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ syāt / aniṣṭañcaitat / tasmānna dīpe jvālānāmavasthitirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1213: drutapavanāmbudhārābhighātāt pratikṣaṇamapūrvaśabdāvirbhāvāt pūrvaśabdavināśācca vṛddhiḥ syāt / adṛṣṭā cāsau / kiñca,
GSP31yuktdipu:1214: pratyakṣata upalabdheḥ / pāṇyupaghātajo hi śabda utpatterūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti pratyakṣasiddham / abhivyaktiriti cenna,
GSP31yuktdipu:1215_0: niyamādarśanāt / śabdānāṃ vācyavaktṛbhedabhinnānāṃ kāraṇaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ / na caitadasti
GSP31yuktdipu:1215_1: samānendriyagrāhyāṇām / kiñca- pṛthak śruteḥ / abhivyaktikāraṇadeśācca pṛthak śrūyate
GSP31yuktdipu:1215_2: śabdaḥ / na caitadabhivyaṅgyānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ dṛṣṭamiti / kṣaṇikabuddhestu prāgevoktā
