GSP31yuktdipu:1462_2: paramāṇavaḥ / tasmānna tanmātrābhyupagamātteṣāmabhyupagamaḥ / upetya vā tadasambhavaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1462_3: kṛtakatvāt / astu vā paramāṇūnāṃ sadbhāvastathāpi tebhyo jagadutpatterasambhavaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1463: kṛtakatvāt / akṛtakena hi jagatkāraṇena yuktaṃ bhavituṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1464: kṛtakāśca paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātsatyapi sadbhāve na teṣāṃ jagatkāraṇamiṣyate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1465_0: ucyate- tasyaiva kāraṇatvaprasaṃgāt / yaddhi tatparamāṇūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇatvena
GSP31yuktdipu:1465_1: yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ syāt na tanniṣādimatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ / kṛtakatvāsiddherayuktamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:1465_2: cet syānmataṃ yadi paramāṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvaṃ prasiddhamata etadyujyate vaktumamuṣmāddhetorakāraṇaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1465_3: paramāṇava iti / tattvasiddham / tasmānna kiṃcidetat / ucyate- paricchinnadeśatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1465_4: iha yatparicchinnadeśaḥ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭam / tadyathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1466: paricchinnadeśaśca / tasmātparamāṇavaḥ kṛtakāḥ / kiṃ cānyat rūpādimattvāt / iha yadrūpādimattatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭam / tadyathā ghaṭāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1467: rūpādimantaśca paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃ cānyat auṣṇyayogāt / yadauṣṇyayuktaṃ tatkṛtakam / tadyathā pradīpaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1468: tadvantaścāgneyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃca vegavattvāt / iha yadvegavattatkṛtakam / tadyathā iṣurvegavān,
GSP31yuktdipu:1469_0: tadvanto vāyavīyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃca snehadravatvayogāt / iha yatsnehadravatvayuktaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1469_1: tatkṛtakam / yathā kedārādiṣvāpaḥ / itthaṃ cāpyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃcādheyatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1469_2: iha yadanyasminnādhīyate tatkṛtakam / tadyathā ṭhaghavam / ādhīyante ca paramāṇavaḥ pṛthivyām,
GSP31yuktdipu:1470: tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃca arthāntarādhāratvāt / iha yadarthāntarasyādhāratvaṃ pratipadyate tatkṛtakam
GSP31yuktdipu:1471_0: / tadyathā ghaṭaḥ / arthāntarasya ca dvyaṇukāderādhāratvamaṇavaḥ pratipadyante tasmātkṛtakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1471_1: kiṃca prāptivyavadhānāt / iha yayormadhye antarā dravyamavasthitam prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1474: yo yaḥ prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ tau kṛtakau tasmāttāvapi kṛtakau / kiṃca dravyāntarārambhakatvāt / iha yad dravyāntarārambhakaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ vaḥ / tadyathā tantuḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1475: dravyārambhakāśca paramāṇavaḥ / tasmātkṛtakāḥ / kiṃca pratyakṣatvāt / iha yatpratyakṣaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭam / tadyathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1476_0: pratyakṣāśca yogināṃ paramāṇavaḥ / tatkṛtakāḥ / ataeva kṛtakatvamiti cet syānmataṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1476_1: yata eva yogināṃ pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavastata eva kṛtakāḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam / asmadādipratyakṣaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1476_2: ghaṭādi hi kṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā / etadapyanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1478_0: kāmaṃ tadapyakṛtakamastu / atha naitadeva tarhi nākṛtakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ / pradhānādiṣu
GSP31yuktdipu:1478_1: prasaṃga iti cenna anabhyupagamāt / śrīkapilabrāhmaṇairapi pradhānapuruṣāvapratyakṣāviti
GSP31yuktdipu:1478_2: naḥ śāstram / tasmādyatkiṃcidetat / sattādivaditi cet syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:1479: yathā sattāguṇatvarūpatvādīnāṃ sati pratyakṣatve 'kṛtakatvam evaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ bhaviṣyatīti / tadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1480: sādhyatvāt / paramāṇvakṛtakatvavatsattādīnāṃ sadbhāvo 'siddhaḥ / tasmācchaśaviṣāṇātpuruṣaviṣāṇasiddhivadagrāhyametat / saukṣmyādaṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvāprasaṃga iti cet syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:1481_0: na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataramanyad bhāvāntaramasti yadeṣāmārambhakaṃ syāt / parā
GSP31yuktdipu:1481_1: khalveṣā kāṣṭhā saukṣmyasya yatparamāṇavaḥ / tasmādeṣāṃ kṛtakatvamanupapannamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1482_2: ca yathā pradhānapuruṣāvevamaṇavo 'pi viśvaṃ vyaśnuvate / tasmātsati
GSP31yuktdipu:1483_0: saukṣmye pākajavadeṣāṃ kṛtakatvamanivāryam / yeṣāṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ pacyata iti pakṣasteṣāmayamanupālambha
GSP31yuktdipu:1483_1: ityataḥ paramāṇusamavetaṃ karmodāhāryam / taddhi sūkṣmamatīndriyaṃ kṛtakaṃ ceti siddhaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1483_4: tathā bhogināmupacitasya svakarmaṇo 'nupabhogātkṛtasya vipraṇāśaḥ / aniṣṭaṃ caitat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1486: puruṣasyākartṛtvamupapādayiṣyāmaḥ / caitanyāviśeṣādīśvarasyāpi sa eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1488_1: dṛṣṭaḥ / asti cāyaṃ mahābhūtendriyabhuvanavinyāsādilakṣaṇaḥ kāryaviśeṣaḥ / tasmādanenāpyatiśayabuddhipūrvakeṇa
GSP31yuktdipu:1488_2: bhavitavyam / yatpūrvako 'yaṃ sa īśvaraḥ / tasmādastīśvara iti / kiṃ cānyat cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1489: tadyathā gośakaṭayoḥ / asti cāyaṃ cetanācetanayoḥ śarīraśarīriṇorabhisambandhaḥ / tasmādanenāpi cetanakṛtena bhavitavyam / yatkṛto 'yaṃ sa īśvaraḥ / tasmādastīśvaraḥ kāraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1492_0: atiśayabuddhipūrvikā vā iti sādhyametat / tasmādanuttaram / kiṃca prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavātkāraṇāntarapratiṣedhāt
GSP31yuktdipu:1492_1: pradhānādayaṃ buddhipūrvakaṃ kāryaviśeṣaṃ kurvīta / prākca pradhānavipariṇāmād buddhireva
GSP31yuktdipu:1492_2: nāstītyupapannametat / śaktimattvātsvata iti cet syātpunaretat sarvaśaktipracita
GSP31yuktdipu:1492_3: īśvaraḥ / tasya prāgapi pradhānavipariṇāmātsvata evecchāyogād buddhisadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyata
GSP31yuktdipu:1496: athāpi syāt nānyeṣāṃ buddhimatāmīśvaratulyā śaktiḥ / ata eṣāṃ pradhānāccharīravyūhasamakālamātmādisannikarṣādvā buddhaya utpadyanta iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1497: īśvarasya tu svata iti / etadapyanupapannam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1498_1: smartavya ityetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt / tasmād grahamātrametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1498_2: evaṃ svata īśvarasya buddhisambhavo na cedbhavet yuktamucyate prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavānna
GSP31yuktdipu:1498_3: buddhimatpūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ / kiṃca phalānupapatteḥ / dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā phalamuddiśya
GSP31yuktdipu:1498_5: kiṃ ca prayojakānupapatteḥ / kiṃ ca anekāntāt / na ca sarvaḥ kāryaviśeṣo buddhipūrvakaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1498_7: na cāstyanudāhṛto vādaḥ / tasmādanekānna buddhimatpūrvakaṃ vyaktam / kiṃ ca duḥkhottaratvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1504: adharmotpattihetvabhāvāt / īśvaraśceddharmādharmayorutpattāvīṣṭe dharmameva prāṇināṃ sukhahetutvādutpādayet nādharmaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1505: prayojanābhāvāt / atha matam svābhāvikī dharmādharmayoḥ svakāraṇādutpattiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1506_0: yaduktaṃ sarvamīśvarabuddhipūrvakaṃ vyaktamiti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ / tasmādīśvaro
GSP31yuktdipu:1506_1: na kāraṇam / yatpunaretaduktaṃ cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvādīśvarasya sadbhāva iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1508: sādhyatvāt / yo 'yaṃ cetanācetanayorgośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1510: tasya kāryakāraṇasaṃghātatvādācetanyam / atha caitraśabdavācyasya piṇḍasyopadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tatkṛta iṣyate tadayuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:1511_0: sādhyatvāt / na hi puruṣakartṛtvamasmatpakṣe prasiddham / ubhayapakṣaprasiddhena
GSP31yuktdipu:1511_1: vyavahāraḥ / kiṃ cānyat anavasthāprasaṃgāt / cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1511_3: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti svābhāvika īśvarasya kāryakāraṇayorabhisambandha iṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1512: na tarhyaikāntiko hetuḥ / tayorācetanyādadoṣa iti cet,
GSP31yuktdipu:1515_1: na syāt / aniṣṭaṃ caitat / kiṃ ca aviparyayaprasaṃgāt / ubhayacaitanyapratijñasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1518_0: tarhyubhayoścaitanyam / kāryakāraṇavattānabhyupagamādadoṣa iti cet vyāpī niravayavo
GSP31yuktdipu:1520: anumānavirodhāt / itthaṃ cedīśvaro yadidamanumānaṃ kāryaviśeṣasyātiśayabuddhipūrvakatvācca cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvāditi tadvyāhanyate / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1523: kṣityādimūrtiparigraho vyāhanyeta / kiṃ cānyat- śruteḥ / śrutirapi cāsya mūrtimācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahasto vitatadhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍītyādi / tadabhyupagamātsvapakṣahāniriti cet,
GSP31yuktdipu:1524: syānmataṃ yadi tarhi śrutivacanānmūrtimānīśvaraḥ parigṛhyate / tena siddhamasyāstitvam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1525: na hyasato mūrtimattvamupapadyata iti kṛtvā / etadapyayuktam / abhiprāyānavabodhāt / na hyekāntena vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ pratyācakṣmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:1526: māhātmyaśarīrādiparigrahāt / yathā tu bhavatocyate pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā nāstītyayamasmadabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1527: tasmādetasya bādhakam / ato na pradhānapuruṣayorabhisambandho 'nyakṛtaḥ / kiṃ cānyat aśakyatvāt / kurvāṇaḥ khalvapyayamabhisambandhaṃ śarīramātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:1533: vibhū ca pradhānapuruṣau / kiṃ ca pārārthyāt / gośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ parārtho dṛṣṭaḥ / na tu pradhānapuruṣayorabhisambandhaḥ parārtha iti / īśvarārtha iti cenna,
GSP31yuktdipu:1534: uktatvāt / dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtha īśvarasyānupapanna ityādāvevoktametat / evaṃ tāvatpāśupatānāmīśvaraparigrahe doṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1535: vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ cāyaṃ doṣaḥ / kiṃ ca dravyādipadārthāntarabhāvābhāvaparikalpanānupapattiśca / tairīśvaro dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyabhūto vā parikalpyamānaḥ parikalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1539: dvividhaṃ hi dravyaṃ anekadravyamadravyaṃ ca / tatra nānekadravyamīśvaraḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_0: parisaṃkhyānāt / pṛthivyādīni manaḥparyantāni navaiva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ / itikaraṇasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_1: parisamāptyarthatvāt / kiṃ ca guṇakarmanirdeśāt / sati cāsya dravyatve vaiśeṣikaguṇanirdeśa
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_2: ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt / kāraṇāntaraprayogasamarthasya ca karma nirdiṣṭaṃ syāt / na
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_3: tu tathā / tasmānna dravyaguṇādayaḥ / āśrayaparatantrā hi guṇādayaḥ parārthāḥ / evaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_4: na dravyādibhūto nāpi padārthāntarabhūtaḥ / padārthatve hi sati dravyādivallakṣaṇamuktamabhaviṣyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1541_5: ācāryeṇa tu noktam / tasmāsūtrakāramate nāstīśvaraḥ / liṅgāditi cet,
GSP31yuktdipu:1542: syānmatam- saṃjñākarmatvamasmadviśiṣṭānāṃ liṅgam / pratyakṣapūrvakatvādvā saṃjñākarmaṇa ityetasmālliṅgādīśvaraparigraha ācāryasya siddha iti / tadapyayuktam / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_0: abhipretāsiddheḥ / satyamanena liṅgenāsmadādibhyo viśiṣṭaśakteḥ kasyacideva māhātmyaśarīrasyānyasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_1: vā pratipattiḥ syāt / saṃjñāmātraṃ tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarvakāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyupasaṃhārapravṛttiheturekaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_2: svatantra iṣyate / tathā cāsmālliṅgātpratipattiḥ / kiṃ cānyat / prāganupadeśe 'kauśalaprasaṃgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_3: īśvaraparatantre cedaṇūnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttī syātāṃ tameva prāgupadiśet / dharmavatpradhānapadārthasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_4: vā prāganupadeśādakuśalaḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyate / na caitadiṣṭamubhayam / kiṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_5: cānyat asaṃkīrtanāt / śāstrapradeśe cāyamīśvaro na kasmiṃścidapyācāryeṇa saṃkīrtitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1543_6: na cāsya vadhvā iva śvaśuranāmasaṃkīrtane doṣopapattiḥ syāt / doṣasaṃvibhāgārthamidamācāryasyāniṣṭamadhyāropyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1544: na tu matamasyaitat / evaṃ kāṇādānāmīśvaro 'stīti pāśupatopajñametat
GSP31yuktdipu:1550_0: yathāntareṇa śarīraṃ karma notpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamantareṇa karma śarīrasyāpi kāraṇāntaramaśakyaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1550_1: kalpayitumiti parasparanimittatvānnāsya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate / tasmānnāstyanayoḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1551: anavasthānāmavasthānapūrvakatvadarśanāt / tadyathā śukraśoṇitāccharīraṃ śarīrācchukraśoṇitamityasya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiradṛṣṭā,
GSP31yuktdipu:1552_0: pratijñāyate cāyonijatvamīśvaraśarīrāṇāmādisarge ca / tathā ca bījāṅkurādayo 'ṅkurādibhyo
GSP31yuktdipu:1552_1: bījamityanavasthā / bhāti cātrādisarge paramāṇumātrādapi bījaprādurbhāvastathā śarīrakarmaṇoranavasthā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1552_2: idānīmapi cādisarge cādhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ syāt / sādhāraṇavigrahatvaprasaṃga iti cet syādetat,
GSP31yuktdipu:1555: tasmānnāyaṃ prasaṃgaḥ / apavarganiyamaprasaṃga iti cet syānmataṃ yadyadhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ paramarṣerevāpavargasādhanaṃ śarīrādutpadyeteti / ucyate- na tasyaiva,
GSP31yuktdipu:1556_0: kiṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ prādhānyāttannimittāni śarīrāṇyādisarge sāṃsiddhikānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1556_1: tatra yasya sattvapradhānaṃ kāryakaraṇaṃ sa paramarṣiḥ / yasya sattvaṃ rajobahulaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1556_2: sa māhātmyaśarīraḥ / evaṃ guṇasamparkād guṇapradhānāpradhānabhāvena yāvatsthāvaraśarīraprādurbhāva
GSP31yuktdipu:1556_3: ityato nāsti guṇānāṃ śarīraviniyogapakṣapātaḥ / tasmādyuktametatkṛtakatvānna karma
GSP31yuktdipu:1556_4: jagatkāraṇamiti / etena caivaṃ vyākhyām / tadapi hi karmaṇāmeva prāptaparipākāṇāmabhidhānamarthāntarameveti
GSP31yuktdipu:1558: kāraṇaparispandasyaiva tadabhidhānasanniveśāt / na hi naḥ kālo nāma kaścidasti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1560_0: akṛtakeṣu tadanupapatteḥ / yadeva kṛtakaṃ tatraiva paramaparamityādiḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1560_1: sa yadi kriyāvyatiriktanimittaḥ syādaviśeṣānnityānityeṣu syāt / kvacitsāmarthādapākajavadadoṣa
GSP31yuktdipu:1560_2: iti cet syānmatam- yathāgnisaṃyogaḥ pākajahetuḥ tathā cāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyāmeva pākajotpattinimittaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1560_3: bhavati nākāśādiṣu / evaṃ kālo 'pi parāparādiheturatha cānityeṣveva syānna nityeṣviti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1561: viśeṣopapatteḥ / rūpādivikriyāheturagnistadyuktaṃ yadasau tadvati dravye pākajānādadyāt, (nā)
GSP31yuktdipu:1562: tadvatyākāśādau / kālastu sambandhamātropakārī na vikriyāhetuḥ / tasmādasadetat / evaṃ yadi kriyābhyo 'nyaḥ kāla iṣyate kāraṇaparispandasya jagatkāraṇatvamathānyatsādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1563_0: yadṛcchāpi na kāraṇaṃ karmavat kāryakāraṇabhāvāt / kāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ hīdaṃ vyaktamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:1563_1: prāgvyākhyātam / sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prekṣāpūrvakṛtānāṃ śayanādīnāmupalabdhau
GSP31yuktdipu:1563_2: yādṛcchikeṣu cānupalabdhau na tasyā liṅgamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:1565: parimāṇādidarśanāt / na hi tata utpannānāṃ parimāṇamupapadyata ityato nāpyanvayaḥ / sātmakanirātmakayoratyantajātibhedāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1566: nāpi śaktistadabhāvāt / nopakāro 'navasthānāt / na vibhāgo nirātmakatvāt /

GSP31yuktdipu:2591_2: madhurāmlādayaḥ / evaṃ gandhatanmātre surabhyādayaḥ / tasmāttasya tasya guṇasya sāmānyamevātra,

GSP31yuktdipu:3220: evaṃ samyagdarśanārthaṃ śarīraṃ samyagjñānādhigame 'pi na nivartate pūrvasaṃskāravaśāt / na ca tadā nivṛttamiti kṛtvā saṃskārakṣaye 'pyavasthāpyata iti // 67 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3224: yadā tu saṃskārakṣaye tannimittasya śarīrasya bhedaḥ, ataḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3226: dharmādharmau kṛtārthau kāraṇe buddhilakṣaṇe layaṃ gacchataḥ / yaścāsya bhūtāvayavaḥ śarīrārambhakaḥ sa sarvabhūteṣu bhūtāni tanmātreṣu,
GSP31yuktdipu:3228_0: ahaṃkāro buddhau buddhiravyakte / seyaṃ tattvānupūrvī tadarthapradhānādutpannā parisamāpte
GSP31yuktdipu:3228_1: punaḥ pradhāne pralayaṃ gacchatīti / pradhānamapyarthavaśādevāsya śarīrāṇi teṣu teṣu
GSP31yuktdipu:3231: atīndriyamasaṃvedya laghu sarvatra sannihitaṃ praśastamanirmitaṃ viśuddhamakṣayaṃ niratiśayam
GSP31yuktdipu:3233_1: brahmaṃ dhruvamamalamabhayamatra sarveṣāṃ guṇadharmāṇāṃ pratipralayaḥ / etatprāpya
GSP31yuktdipu:3233_4: kathaṃ nāmaikāntikamātyantikaṃ ca kaivalyaṃ syāditi yatraivotthānaṃ śāstrasya tatraivopasaṃhāra
GSP31yuktdipu:3237: āha, kimarthaṃ punaridaṃ śāstraṃ kena vā pūrvaṃ prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3240: kathaṃ nāmājñānavaśāttatsaṃskāropanipatitānāṃ prāṇināmapavargaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ śāstraṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3244: samyagākhyātam, cirābhyastasya vidyāsrotaso nirvacanasāmarthyāt syādetat, kathamidaṃ guhyamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3245: ucyate- kathaṃ vedaṃ guhyaṃ na syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3253: pralayo 'pi nimittāntarātsvābhāvyādeva bhūtānāmapi vyaktānāṃ niṣpattimatāmiti yāvat / evaṃ ca mahadādayo 'pi parigṛhītā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3254: āha, puruṣādayastarhi parityaktāḥ / kathaṃ vā bhūtaśabda iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3255_0: ucyate- vitathapratiṣedhārthatvāt / yāvat kiṃcidavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ tasya sarvasyeha
GSP31yuktdipu:3255_1: sthityādaya ucyanta iti / utpattivināśapratiṣedhāviśeṣāt / evamapi puruṣādīnāmutpattipralayāvapi
GSP31yuktdipu:3256: aviśeṣāditi / ucyate- sambhavato viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati / tatra sthitireva puruṣādīnām / itareṣāṃ tu sthityutpattipralayā iti vijñāsyāmaḥ // 69 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3260: āha, kasmai punaridaṃ śāstraṃ paramarṣiṇā prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3263: tatra pavitraṃ pāvanāt / agryaṃ sarvaduḥkhakṣapaṇasamarthatvāt / pavitrāntarāṇi punarekadeśaṃ kṣālayantyadhamarṣaṇagaṅgādīni / tasmādidamevāgryaṃ munirāsuraye 'nukampayā pradadau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3269: sāṃsiddhikenaiva jñānena tatprāpteḥ / tasmādviparītārthāsambhavāt pariśeṣādakasmādācāryaḥ śāstranidhānaṃ pradadāviti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3271_0: kiṃ tarhi anukampayā pradadau / ādhyātmikādhidaivikādhibhautikairduḥkhaiḥ pīḍyamānamāsurimupalabhya
GSP31yuktdipu:3271_1: svātmani ca jñānasāmarthyātsati kāryakāraṇasamprayoge duḥkhānāmapravṛttiṃ parijñāya
GSP31yuktdipu:3271_2: śiṣyaguṇāṃśca kathaṃ nāma yathā mama sukhaduḥkheṣu jñānopanipātātsāmyamevamāsurerapi
GSP31yuktdipu:3276: tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3277: bahubhyo janakavaśiṣṭhādibhyaḥ samākhyātam / asya tu śāstrasya bhagavato 'gre pravṛttatvānna śāstrāntaravad vaṃśaḥ śakyo varṣaśatasahasrairapyākhyātum // 70 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3284_2: eva na sūpapādaṃ kiṃ punaḥ śravaṇaprayogābhyām / āha ca- caturbhiḥ prakārairvidyā
GSP31yuktdipu:3284_3: sūpayuktā bhavati- āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena prayogakālena ca / tatra cāsyāgamanakālenaivāyuḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3284_4: paryupayuktaṃ syāttataśca śāstrānarthakyam / ityasya mandadhiyāmapyāśu grahaṇadhāraṇaprayogasampatsyāditi
GSP31yuktdipu:3290: kathaṃ cāsya samyaksiddhāntavijñānasyāpyanekagranthaśatasahasrākhyeyaṃ sāṃkhyapadārthaṃ satattvamakhaṇḍamācāryāṇāṃ saptatyā saṃkṣiptavān // 71 //
GSP31yuktdipu:3297_3: paramarṣyādiyathoktāgamena pramāṇatrayaṃ puraskṛtya tarkadṛśā vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ / na
GSP31yuktdipu:3303: sphuṭābhidheyā madhurāpi bhāratī manīṣiṇo nopakhalaṃ virājate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3305: nayanti santaśca yataḥ svaśaktito guṇaṃ pareṣāṃ tanumapyudāratām /
GSP31yuktdipu:3306: iti prayātveṣa mama śramaḥ satāṃ vicāraṇānugrahamātrapātratām //
GSP31yuktdipu:3307: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau caturthaṃ prakaraṇamekādaśaṃ cāhnikaṃ sampūrṇam //
